episodes.description: Locked in battle with the Saiyans, Goku gives Nappa a brutal demonstration of the training he received from King Kai. Broken and defeated, Nappa must now face the ferocious wrath of Vegeta!

episodes.title: Goku vs. Vegeta
episodes.description: Goku decides to take on mighty Vegeta all by himself! The two appear evenly matched, but both are hiding their true strength. The epic battle is underway - which mighty warrior will claim victory?

episodes.title: Saiyan Sized Secret
episodes.description: Vegeta and Goku continue trading brutal blows, but the action intensifies when Vegeta reveals the secret power of the Saiyans: the ability to transform into a giant, planet-destroying ape!

episodes.title: Spirit Bomb Away!
episodes.description: Goku feels the brunt of Vegeta’s fully-realized Saiyan power! Earth’s greatest hero is left with no choice except to use the Spirit Bomb. If his attack fails, he may find himself completely doomed!

episodes.title: Hero in the Shadows
episodes.description: With Goku caught in the clutches of the giant ape Vegeta, Krillin attacks with his Destructo Disk! When his effort falls short, an unlikely hero steps out of the shadows!

episodes.title: Krillin's Offensive
episodes.description: Goku passes the power of the Spirit Bomb to Krillin, who - with King Kai’s guidance - launches the bomb at Vegeta. The Saiyan is sent flying into the sky, but is the evil warrior really gone for good?

episodes.title: Mercy
episodes.description: Vegeta is crushed beneath the full weight of Gohan’s giant ape form! With the Saiyan battered and defeated, Krillin moves to finish the Saiyan with a final blow - but Goku has other plans.

episodes.title: Picking Up The Pieces
episodes.description: The gang mourns the loss of Yamcha, Tien, Chiaotzu, and Piccolo. With Kami gone, Earth’s Dragon Balls have disappeared. Will the surviving heroes find a way to wish their fallen friends back to life?

episodes.title: Plans for Departure
episodes.description: Bulma accidentally destroys the Saiyan spaceship! Luckily, Mr. Popo reveals the existence of another ship that may be able to reach Namek. Can they find it in time, and will the old ship still work if they do?

episodes.title: Nursing Wounds
episodes.description: Goku, Krillin, and Gohan prepare for the return of the Saiyans. Meanwhile, Bulma and Mr. Popo search for a second spaceship capable of transporting her to Planet Namek.

episodes.title: Friends or Foes?
episodes.description: Gohan, Bulma, and Krillin blast off for Planet Namek in search of the magic Dragon Balls, but their journey quickly turns chaotic when they encounter a bizarre situation in the vacuum of space!

episodes.title: Held Captive
episodes.description: Bulma, Gohan, and Krillin are mistaken for friends of Frieza and taken prisoner by an angry army of children! To regain their freedom and continue on their mission, the gang must convince the kids of their innocence.

episodes.title: Look Out Below
episodes.description: A near-fatal crash landing turns out to have a silver lining when Bulma, Gohan, and Krillin are rescued by two friendly Namekians who agree to help them locate the seven Dragon Balls.

episodes.title: The Search Continues
episodes.description: Gohan, Krillin, and Bulma continue their search for the Dragon Balls with the help of their new friend Zaacro. Back on Earth, Goku has escaped from the hospital to begin training for his upcoming re-match with Vegeta.

episodes.title: A Friendly Surprise
episodes.description: As Bulma, Krillin, and Gohan close in on the last of the Dragon Balls, they uncover a shocking secret about their Namekian friends. Meanwhile, Goku works to build up his strength, and Vegeta sets his sights on revenge!

episodes.title: Brood of Evil
episodes.description: Bulma, Krillin, and Gohan finally continue their quest to locate all seven Dragon balls. Unfortunately, the gang soon discovers that they aren’t the only ones seeking the magical orbs!

episodes.title: Frieza Strikes!
episodes.description: Krillin, Gohan, and Bulma are horrified to see Vegeta’s space pod land on Planet Namek, but the Saiyan Prince is the least of their problems. Yet another epically evil villain has come to Namek in search of the Dragon Balls!

episodes.title: Defying Orders
episodes.description: With the odds are rapidly mounting against them, Krillin and Gohan will need some serious help if they hope to recover the Dragon Balls from Frieza and his henchmen.

episodes.title: Namek's Defense
episodes.description: Krillin and Gohan get their first glimpse of Frieza’s cruelty as the villain unleashes his henchmen upon an unsuspecting Namek village. Frieza wants the fifth Dragon Ball, and he is prepared to learn its location by any means necessary!

episodes.title: The Hunted
episodes.description: Gohan risks his life to rescue a Namek boy from the clutches of Frieza’s evil henchmen. Now Gohan and Krillin have an even bigger problem on their hands: Dodoria is chasing them, and he won’t stop until he has his revenge!

episodes.title: The Prince Fights Back
episodes.description: Dodoria’s search for Krillin and Gohan brings him face to face with an unexpected foe - Vegeta! The Saiyan prince has a score to settle with Dodoria, and the time for a final showdown between these two powerful villains has arrived!

episodes.title: Unexpected Problem
episodes.description: Goku’s journey to Namek takes an unexpected detour when his spaceship is knocked off course by an asteroid! Goku has to act fast to get his ship back on track because he’s headed straight for the fiery center of a star!

episodes.title: Vegeta has a Ball
episodes.description: With his new abilities, Vegeta quickly tracks down and forcefully acquires another Dragon Ball. Now, there is only one magic orb left to find, and Dende knows who has it - the Eldest Namekian!

episodes.title: The Past and Future
episodes.description: King Kai becomes concerned after learning that Goku is on a collision course with the ruthless Frieza. Meanwhile, back on Planet Namek, the battle between Vegeta and Zarbon has begun!

episodes.title: Zarbon's Surprise
episodes.description: Vegeta’s latest battle heats up as Zarbon reveals his true power: the ability to transform into a monstrous beast! With his increased size and strength, Zarbon seems ready to turn the lights out on the Saiyan Prince - permanently!

episodes.title: Guru's Gift
episodes.description: When Krillin speaks to the Eldest Namekian, he gets a double surprise! Not only does he receive a Dragon Ball, but the sleeping powers within him are awoken! Will Krillin’s incredible new strength be enough to save his friends?

episodes.title: Piccolo vs. Everyone
episodes.description: Yamcha, Tien, and Chiaotzu continue training, but their workout gets intense when Piccolo challenges them all to a three-on-one bout! Back on Namek, Frieza’s henchmen try to revive Vegeta in order to obtain the missing Dragon Ball.

episodes.title: Zarbon's Mission
episodes.description: Vegeta escapes from the clutches of Frieza, and steals the Dragon Balls in the process! Elsewhere, Goku’s journey through space grows perilous as his ship is caught in a powerful magnetic storm!

episodes.title: Gohan, the Hunted
episodes.description: Krillin returns from his meeting with the Eldest Namekian only to be greeted by a pair of unwelcome visitors: Vegeta and Zarbon! Meanwhile, Gohan discovers the seventh and final Dragon Ball!

episodes.title: Unknown Enemies
episodes.description: The Ginyu Force has been dispatched to Planet Namek to help search for the Dragon Balls. Unaware of this new threat, Krillin and Gohan struggle to keep the seventh Dragon Ball from falling into Vegeta’s evil hands.

episodes.title: Destination: Guru
episodes.description: While Krillin and Gohan visit the Eldest Namekian, they leave the seventh Dragon Ball their hidden camp. When the Dragon Ball mysteriously disappears, Bulma must embark on a daring underwater adventure to get it back!

episodes.title: Bulma's Big Day
episodes.description: Bulma is taken hostage by Frieza’s evil henchmen, who force her to lead them on an underwater quest for the Dragon Balls. Without Gohan and Krillin to save her, she’ll have to outsmart her captors — or wind up sleeping with the fishes!

episodes.title: Hidden Power
episodes.description: Krillin and Gohan complete their journey to Guru’s house, but little do they know, Vegeta is hot on their trail! Can Guru unlock Gohan’s hidden powers in time to hold off the rampaging Saiyan’s wrath?

episodes.title: New Ally, New Problem
episodes.description: The Ginyu Force has arrived on Planet Namek! Now, Vegeta, Krillin, and Gohan must form an uneasy alliance as they stand face to face with five of the fiercest warriors in the universe!

episodes.title: Guldo's Mind Binds
episodes.description: The battle with the Ginyu Force begins, as Gohan and Krillin launch a barrage of explosive energy blasts at Guldo! The Heroes are rendered helpless by Guldo’s Mind Blind technique, and this time, there is no one to save them!

episodes.title: Recoome Unleashed
episodes.description: The battle with Guldo may be over, but the real nightmare is just beginning! Recoome, the most massive member of the Ginyu Force, is ready to fight, and even the mighty Vegeta’s attacks have no effect on this monstrous foe!

episodes.title: Let the Battle Begin
episodes.description: With Krillin and Vegeta both out of commission, only Gohan remains to carry on the fight against Recoome! The young Saiyan must summon every ounce of his strength and courage in order to face this powerful foe.

episodes.title: Goku's New Power
episodes.description: Goku has arrived on Planet Namek, and without a second to lose! Gohan and Krillin are hanging by a thread, held at the mercy of the Ginyu Force! Has Goku’s training in 100-times gravity prepared him to face these powerful foes?

episodes.title: A Legend Revealed
episodes.description: As Vegeta, Krillin, and Gohan look on, Goku easily deflects the attacks of Jeice and Burter, two of the Force’s fiercest warriors. Could Goku have become what Vegeta thought was only a legend: a Super Saiyan?

episodes.title: Ginyu Assault
episodes.description: When Goku proves too much for Burter and Jeice to handle on their own, Jeice retreats in search of reinforcements. Now, the real test for Goku and his newly-acquired powers is about to begin as Captain Ginyu enters the fight!

episodes.title: Incredible Force!
episodes.description: As the battle between Goku and Captain Ginyu rages on, Gohan and Krillin steal the unguarded Dragon Balls from Frieza’s ship. It’s a race against time, and our heroes must unlock the power of the Dragon Balls before it’s too late!

episodes.title: Frieza Approaches
episodes.description: Goku astounds Captain Ginyu with his amazing new powers, but the Captain still has a few tricks up his sleeve! Meanwhile, Frieza arrives at the home of the Eldest Namek and begins a battle with the noble warrior, Nail!

episodes.title: Goku Is Ginyu and Ginyu Is Goku
episodes.description: In an attempt to save the Elder, Nail fights a hopeless battle against the ruthless Frieza. Meanwhile, finding himself no match for Goku’s superior abilities, Captain Ginyu unleashes his ultimate attack, the Body Switch Technique!

episodes.title: Calling the Eternal Dragon
episodes.description: Armed with the Dragon Radar, Gohan and Krillin recover the seven Dragon Balls from their hiding places. But before they can summon the Eternal Dragon to make their wish, they are confronted by a powerful new enemy - Goku?!

episodes.title: Gohan, Defeat Your Dad!
episodes.description: After taking control of Goku’s body, Captain Ginyu turns his attention to Gohan and Krillin! With Goku trapped in the Captain’s broken body, it’s up to Gohan to stop the rampaging Ginyu!

episodes.title: Captain Ginyu... The Frog
episodes.description: As the bout between Captain Ginyu and Vegeta heats up, Goku summons the last of his strength and tricks his foe into reversing the Body Switch Technique. Now, Goku, Krillin, and Gohan must join forces with Vegeta for the battle with Frieza.

episodes.title: Password Is Porunga
episodes.description: Having acquired all seven Namekian Dragon Balls, Krillin and Gohan are ready to summon the dragon and make their wish. There’s just one problem: they don’t know the password!

episodes.title: Piccolo's Return
episodes.description: With the help of young Dende, Krillin and Gohan learn they will be granted three wishes! But even as Krillin and Gohan call upon the dragon, Vegeta races to the scene on a mission to wish for mortality!

episodes.title: The Fusion
episodes.description: With the Dragon Balls gone and his plan in ruins, Frieza unleashes his fury upon Vegeta, Gohan, and Krillin. Elsewhere, the newly-revived Piccolo finds himself on Planet Namek. Will his arrival be enough to turn the tide?

episodes.title: Fighting Power: One Million??
episodes.description: Frieza reveals a dark secret from Vegeta’s past, but the villain has an even more shocking secret in store for the Z-fighters! As the monster’s power level rises to terrifying new heights, all hope for the universe seems lost!

episodes.title: Gohan Attacks
episodes.description: Frieza claims his first victim, Krillin, and Gohan must summon every ounce of his strength in order to save his friend. Can the young Saiyan put a stop to Freiza’s ruthless onslaught, or is he destined to become the next victim?

episodes.title: Piccolo the Super-Namek
episodes.description: Gohan and Krillin continue their struggle against the overwhelming powers of Frieza, but as the fighting reaches its peak, a new warrior arrives on the battlefield to aid them in their efforts!

episodes.title: Déjà vu
episodes.description: Piccolo quickly takes control of the battle with Frieza, and the putrid purple monster is shocked to learn the secret behind his opponent’s powers!

episodes.title: Frieza's Second Transformation
episodes.description: Just as it appears that Piccolo has gained the upper hand, Frieza quickly dashes all hopes for victory by revealing his second monstrous transformation!

episodes.title: Another Transformation?
episodes.description: Unable to watch as Piccolo is overwhelmed by Frieza, Gohan springs into action! Meanwhile, Vegeta devises a risky plan for transforming himself into a Super Saiyan!

episodes.title: Dende's Demise
episodes.description: Having reached his ultimate form, Frieza is determined to destroy the remaining Z-fighters one by one, but Vegeta boldly announces the end of Frieza’s tyrannical reign! Are Vegeta’s claims true? Has he become a Super Saiyan?

episodes.title: The Renewed Goku
episodes.description: Despite his new powers, Vegeta proves no match for Frieza! Meanwhile, Goku’s time in the rejuvenation chamber is nearly complete! Can he reach the battlefield in time to save his friends?

episodes.title: The End of Vegeta
episodes.description: Goku rejoins his friends on the battlefield, but not before Vegeta is defeated by Frieza! As the Saiyan Prince clings to life by a thread, he reveals the secrets of his violent past.

episodes.title: The Ultimate Battle
episodes.description: Feeling a new sense of connection to the dwindling Saiyan race, Goku wages war on the monstrous Frieza! As the fight intensifies, Frieza directs his energy blasts at Namek itself, turning the planet into a lava-spewing war zone!

episodes.title: Clash of the Super Powers
episodes.description: Goku and Frieza continue their epic battle! An underwater attack puts Goku on top until Frieza traps him in an energy ball! It's fun and games for Frieza, but the exploding ball may prove deadly for Goku!

episodes.title: Frieza's Boast
episodes.description: Frieza vows to beat Goku without using his hands, but the mighty Saiyan soon makes the mosnter eat his words! Elsewhere, Captain Ginyu uses his Body Switch Technique on Bulma, leaving her trapped in the body of a frog!

episodes.title: Bold and Fearless
episodes.description: Captain Ginyu returns to the battlefield in Bulma's body! Can Piccolo, Krillin, and Gohan handle this Femme Fatale? Later, Frieza powers up to fifty percent of his maximum, and Goku finds himself completely outmatched!

episodes.title: Embodiment of Fire
episodes.description: Goku’s powerful Kaio-Ken attack has no effect on Frieza, who is still only fighting with fifty-percent of his power! Just as it seems Frieza has won the battle, a dream-like vision helps Goku ascend to a higher level of power and strength!

episodes.title: Trump Card
episodes.description: Once again, Goku is rescued by a vision! This time, Vegeta talks to Goku from beyond the grave to offer new hope and encouragement! But when Goku realizes that the battle against Frieza is futile, he turns to his last resort: the Spirit Bomb!

episodes.title: Keep the Chance Alive
episodes.description: Yamcha, Tien, and Chiaotzu find themselves in serious trouble when the Ginyu Force invades King Kai’s planet! Meanwhile, as Frieza thwarts Goku’s efforts to gather energy for the Spirit Bomb, Piccolo must enter the battle!

episodes.title: Power of the Spirit
episodes.description: Chaos erupts on King Kai’s planet as the Z-fighters battle the Ginyu Force! Back on Planet Namek, the life and death struggle between Piccolo and Frieza rages on, and Goku completes his Spirit Bomb!

episodes.title: Transformed at Last
episodes.description: A victory celebration comes to a halt when Frieza reappears! With no reserves left, Goku watches helplessly as Frieza directs his fury at Piccolo and Krillin. Enraged by the loss of his friends, Goku undergoes a wild transformation!

episodes.title: Explosion of Anger
episodes.description: Engulfed in golden light, Goku announces that he is now a Super Saiyan! Frieza is unimpressed - until the fighting begins! In a raging battle, Frieza is horrified when he realizes that Goku is now superior to him in every way!

episodes.title: Namek's Destruction
episodes.description: Finding himself no match for Goku, Frieza attacks Planet Namek! Unable to react in time, Goku is forced to watch helplessly as the fiery blast rips through Namek’s core! Can anyone survive such incredible destruction?

episodes.title: A Final Attack
episodes.description: With only minutes to go before the planet explodes, Frieza reaches his maximum power! Meanwhile, Gohan and Bulma race back to Goku’s spaceship. Can Goku defeat Frieza in time to rejoin his son and fly to safety?

episodes.title: Approaching Destruction
episodes.description: The battle between Goku and Frieza rages on! Back on Earth, the seven Dragon Balls have been restored, but with Namek’s destruction imminent, can Kami and Mr. Popo summon the Eternal Dragon before it’s too late?

episodes.title: Gohan Returns
episodes.description: Frieza’s victims have been wished back to life, but as they begin to rise, Goku falls - overwhelmed by Frieza’s devastating assault. Sensing his father’s defeat, Gohan rushes to the scene as the universe’s final hope.

episodes.title: The Last Wish
episodes.description: Guru and the people of Namek have been brought back to life, and the dragon Porunga has reappeared to grant the last of three wishes. While a newly enraged Goku resumes his onslaught against the evil Frieza, Dende races to make the final wish!

episodes.title: Duel on a Vanishing Planet
episodes.description: Goku chooses to stay behind and finish his fight with Frieza. With Namek set to explode any second, there seems no way for Goku to defeat Frieza and escape in time! Has the Super Saiyan made the greatest mistake of his life?

episodes.title: Pathos of Frieza
episodes.description: Time grows short for Goku as each passing second brings Namek closer to ultimate destruction. As the Super Saiyan’s strength increases with every blow, it appears his epic battle with Frieza has at last reached its conclusion!

episodes.title: Frieza Defeated!!
episodes.description: Frieza lashes out in a blind rage, launching a reckless volley of energy attacks. In the face of Goku’s superior power, the evil tyrant’s greatest fear has finally been realized: defeat at the hands of a Super Saiyan!

episodes.title: Mighty Blast of Rage
episodes.description: Even after being sliced into pieces by his own energy disk, Frieza isn’t ready to release his stranglehold on the universe. With what little power he has left, Frieza fires a final energy blast after Goku as he leaves the battlefield!

episodes.title: Namek's Explosion... Goku's End?
episodes.description: Even though it looks like Goku is trapped on the exploding planet Namek, Dende has a good reason to celebrate: the Dragon Balls have the power to bring Goku back! But if that’s the case, why does everyone still look so sad?

episodes.title: Goku's Alive!!
episodes.description: It is a time of joyful reunions as old friends long absent are finally wished home with the Dragon Balls! Krillin and Yamcha are brought back from the spirit world, but Porunga, the Namekian dragon, has startling news about Goku!

episodes.title: The Heavens Tremble
episodes.description: Gohan's going fishing, Krillin's found a girlfriend, and it looks as though peace has once again returned to the Earth. But a terrible evil lurks beneath this tranquil surface: Garlic Junior has escaped from the Dead Zone!
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Black Fog of Terror
episodes.description: With the help of the Spice Boys, Garlic Junior releases the Black Water Mist upon an unsuspecting world. As the dreaded fog spreads, so does Garlic Junior's control over the Earth!
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Battle in Kami's Lookout
episodes.description: As Piccolo attempts to hold off the Spice Boys and the infected Z Fighters, Gohan and Krillin race toward Kami’s Lookout to retrieve the one thing capable of reversing the effects of the Black Water Mist: the Sacred Water!
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Fight With Piccolo
episodes.description: With Piccolo infected by the Black Water Mist and Kami trapped in a glass bottle, Garlic Jr. allows his Spice Boys to “have sport” with Earth’s heroic defenders. Will Spice’s energy blast finish off Krillin for good?
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Call for Restoration
episodes.description: Krillin, after suffering a Spice Boys beating, attempts to free Kami and Mr. Popo, but he soon falls prey to the Black Water Mist. Gohan is the only hero left who can save the Earth, but can he do it with his two best friends against him?
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Suicidal Course
episodes.description: Piccolo and Krillin spring their trap, revealing that they have pretended to be infected by the Black Water Mist! Enraged, Garlic Jr. transforms using the energy of the Makyo Star and warns that the Sacred Water’s effectiveness will soon expire.
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Extreme Measures
episodes.description: Garlic Junior and his Spice Boys harness the evil power of the Makyo Star to become stronger than ever, but Gohan, Krillin, and Piccolo are ready to battle this new threat!
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: The World Awakens
episodes.description: In a last ditch effort to save his friends, Gohan launches an all out assault on Garlic Junior! Meanwhile, deep within the Lookout, Kami and Mr. Popo are under siege by the Former Guardians!
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Brief Chance for Victory
episodes.description: Blinded by rage and desperate to destroy his enemies, Garlic Junior uses his power to open up the Dead Zone! With Piccolo and Krillin out of commission, Gohan is the only one left who can stop him!
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Krillin's Proposal
episodes.description: Even though peace has been restored on Earth, Krillin faces his toughest challenge ever: surviving a shopping trip with Maron! And it looks like she’s picking out a wedding dress! Are Krillin and Maron planning to tie the knot?
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Frieza's Counterattack
episodes.description: Gohan’s cracking the books, and his new tutor is cracking the whip! But study time is almost over, for a powerful evil is racing toward the Earth! Gohan’s worst fears have come to life: Frieza has survived!
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: The Mysterious Youth
episodes.description: The Earth faces its darkest hour as Frieza and his father King Cold rapidly approach! Without Goku to assist them, the Z-Fighters prepare to launch a desperate attack against the most powerful evil the universe has ever known!
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Another Super Saiyan?
episodes.description: Frieza and King Cold descend upon the Earth, but a mysterious warrior has come to thwart their diabolical plot for revenge. Does this brash young hero have what it takes to stand up to these twin titans of evil?
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Welcome Back Goku
episodes.description: After defeating Frieza and King Cold, the mysterious stranger announces the exact time and place of Goku's arrival on Earth. Can this young Super-Saiyan really predict the future?! Gohan and the others are determined to find out!
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Mystery Revealed
episodes.description: After testing Goku in combat, the mysterious stranger reveals his true identity! What does his timely arrival mean?! In a startling conversation with Goku, this powerful hero from the future tells all!
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Goku's Special Technique
episodes.description: The future has been written - or has it? That’s what Goku and the rest of the Z-Fighters must decide as they hear Trunks’ ominous warning. The Androids are coming! And they just might be bringing the end of the world with them!
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Z Warriors Prepare
episodes.description: Gohan learns some new tricks, Vegeta pushes himself to the breaking point, and Yamcha struggles just to keep up as everyone prepares to face the looming Android menace! But will all their preparations be enough?
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Goku's Ordeal
episodes.description: ChiChi wants a car! Goku and Piccolo take a day off from training to enroll in driving school. These two mighty warriors may be the Earth’s only chance for survival, but what are the chances they’ll learn how to parallel park?
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: The Androids Appear
episodes.description: Three years have come and gone, and the day of reckoning has finally arrived! The Androids are here, and they’re wreaking havoc on an unsuspecting city! Goku and his friends must now put their training to the test!
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: A Handy Trick
episodes.description: Yamcha is held at the mercy of the ruthless Android 20, and Goku and the others must race to help their friend. Believing their power to be far superior, the Androids tempt Goku’s rage by leveling half of the city!
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Double Trouble for Goku
episodes.description: The battle with the Androids begins as Goku launches an all out assault against Android 19. The Super Saiyan seems to have the fight under control, but something is about to go horribly wrong!
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Upgrade to Super Saiyan
episodes.description: Attacked from within by a crippling virus, Goku is helpless against the maniacal Android 19. But just when it looks like the end for Goku, Vegeta appears on the scene! And he’s got a few big surprises in store for the Androids!
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: The Secret of Dr. Gero
episodes.description: In his first fight as a Super Saiyan, Vegeta takes control of the battlefield and defeats Android 19 in convincing fashion! Unwilling to share 19’s fate, Android 20 runs for cover in the mountains!
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: More Androids?!
episodes.description: Vegeta, Piccolo, and Gohan lead an exhaustive search through the mountains for Android 20. But the hunters are also the hunted! Android 20 lurks in the shadows, ready to strike, and it looks like Piccolo is his first target!
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Follow Dr. Gero
episodes.description: Our heroes make a startling discovery: Android 20 is none other than Dr. Gero himself! Before they can act on this new knowledge, the diabolical doctor flees to his secret laboratory, where he intends to awaken more killer androids!
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Nightmare Comes True
episodes.description: The race is on, as the Z-Fighters search frantically for Dr. Gero’s hidden laboratory! But rather than stop the androids before they’re activated, Vegeta wants a challenge! Despite Trunks’ warning, he chooses to fight the androids alone
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Goku's Assassin
episodes.description: Dr. Gero escapes to his mountain hideout and brings his killer androids to life. Without the help of Goku, all hope seems lost. Dr. Gero appears one step closer to ultimate vengeance, but his evil creations have a vendetta of their own!
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Deadly Beauty
episodes.description: Vegeta and Android 18 have a showdown on the highway. Trunks and the others are there to help, but the Saiyan prince insists on fighting his opponent man-to-android! Will Vegeta’s overconfidence be his undoing?
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: No Match for the Androids
episodes.description: In an earthshaking battle, the beautiful Android 18 brings Vegeta to his knees. But before she can deliver the final blow, Trunks steps in to help. Soon an all out war between good and evil begins, and the androids have the upper hand.
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Last Ditch Effort
episodes.description: Vegeta, Trunks, Tien, and Piccolo realize a grim truth: unless they can increase their powers quickly, they’ll have no chance against the androids. In a drastic move, Piccolo flies to Kami’s Lookout and makes a most unexpected proposal!
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Closing In
episodes.description: The androids hit the road in pursuit of Goku, but they’re delayed by some hyperactive hoodlums. Krillin and Trunks race to move Goku to a safer hiding place, and Kami wrestles with Piccolo’s difficult offer.
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Unwelcome Discovery
episodes.description: The Z-fighters retreat to Master Roshi’s house to plan their next move. Meanwhile, Bulma makes a startling discovery: the wreckage of a second time capsule! Where did it come from, and more importantly, who was in it?
episodes.saga: Garlic Jr., Trunks and Androids Sagas (1991–92)

episodes.title: Seized with Fear
episodes.description: Trunks and Krillin join Bulma at the crash site of the mysterious time capsule and find an eerie clue: the shell of a large, locust-like creature! Whatever arrived in the time capsule isn’t human, and it’s on the loose!
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: The Reunion
episodes.description: An insect-like monster threatens to turn Gingertown into a ghastly graveyard! In response to this new menace, Kami fuses with Piccolo, and the resulting Super Namekian flies to Gingertown for a showdown of epic proportions!
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: Borrowed Powers
episodes.description: Gingertown becomes a battlefield as Piccolo confronts Cell. This monster from the future gains his strength by sucking the life out of his victims! But that’s not the creature’s only talent. He also knows the Kamehameha Wave!
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: His Name is Cell
episodes.description: Heavily-armored tanks fail to halt Cell’s rampage, and now it’s up to Piccolo to stop the monster! As the Namekian fights for survival, Cell reveals that he’s actually an android, the ultimate achievement of Dr. Gero!
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: Piccolo's Folly
episodes.description: Piccolo cleverly distracts Cell long enough to regenerate his arm. The Namekian is ready for another round, and Krillin and Trunks have arrived to provide backup! With the odds mounting against him, Cell makes a tactical decision.
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: Laboratory Basement
episodes.description: With hopes of saving the future, Trunks and Krillin race to destroy Dr. Gero’s lab. Meanwhile, Piccolo and Tien search for the elusive Cell. But how can they stop an enemy who knows their every move?
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: Our Hero Awakes
episodes.description: In South City, Cell plows through more civilians and accidentally runs into Krillin! Goku finally gets back on his feet, but with Cell and the other androids in full stride, can the Saiyan hero still make a difference?
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: Time Chamber
episodes.description: As Cell continues his deadly march, Goku hatches a plan to squeeze a year’s worth of training into just one day! Back at Master Roshi’s, the android trio arrives looking for Goku! Can Piccolo hold them off until the Saiyans return?
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: The Monster is Coming
episodes.description: Behind the closed doors of the Hyperbolic Time Chamber, Vegeta and Trunks struggle to push past the level of Super Saiyan! Down on Earth, Piccolo challenges Android 17 to a battle!
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: He's Here
episodes.description: Stronger than ever after fusing with Kami, Piccolo leads the attack against the androids! It looks like the Super Namekian has things under control until Cell arrives on the battlefield! Can anyone stop this hideous monster?!
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: Up to Piccolo
episodes.description: Just as Cell is about to absorb Android 17, Piccolo bravely steps in and foils the monster’s plan! Does the Super Namekian really have a chance at stopping Cell on his own?! Or is he simply putting off the inevitable?
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: Silent Warrior
episodes.description: When Android 16 claims to be as strong as Cell, it seems like a wild boast! But after he launches an offensive that throws Cell against the ropes, it becomes clear that the big android has the power to back up his words!
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: Say Goodbye, 17
episodes.description: It’s android against android as 16 clashes with Cell. Android 16 is the stronger fighter, but Cell is far too driven to be stopped now! With an underhanded attack, Cell moves one step closer to his gruesome transformation!
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: Sacrifice
episodes.description: With an onslaught of psychic blasts, Tien gives Androids 16 and 18 a chance to escape, but the powerful attack rapidly drains his strength. Tien may have saved the androids, but can he save himself?
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: Saiyans Emerge
episodes.description: Trunks and Vegeta emerge from the time chamber after a year of intense training. Goku and Gohan are next into the room, but with Cell nearing his ultimate form, can the fighters afford to wait another day?
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: Super Vegeta
episodes.description: Cell obliterates a chain of islands in search of Android 18! Vegeta, fresh from the time chamber, is ready to test his new strength against the monster, but is he really stronger than a Super Saiyan?
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: Bow to the Prince
episodes.description: It’s show-and-tell for Vegeta as he demonstrates how much difference a year of training can make! Meanwhile, back in the time chamber, Gohan struggles to become a Super Saiyan.
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: Hour of Temptation
episodes.description: Vegeta quickly pounds Cell six feet into the ground! With his back against the wall, the monstrous android attacks Vegeta’s weakest point: his arrogance! Can the Saiyan Prince resist Cell’s tempting challenge?
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: Krillin's Decision
episodes.description: With beautiful Android 18 in his sights, Krillin clutches the controller that will shut her down forever. But when the moment arrives, the little man hesitates! All the while, Cell looms overhead, hungry for perfection!
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: The Last Defense
episodes.description: With the remote control smashed, Krillin and Trunks must save Android 18 from Cell’s power-hungry grasp. But Vegeta has other plans in mind. Will trunks attack his own father to save humanity?
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: Cell is Complete
episodes.description: The earth’s greatest fear has come true: Cell is complete! Can anyone stop the android nightmare in his final, perfect form? As the heroes nervously line up, a glimmer of hope shines from above. Gohan is a Super Saiyan!
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: Vegeta Must Pay
episodes.description: After allowing Cell to reach his final form, Vegeta is ready for the challenge he was promised. But as Cell easily deflects the Saiyan’s every blow, it’s clear that Vegeta has more on his hands than he bargained for!
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: Trunks Ascends
episodes.description: Tapping into the deepest wells of his energy, Vegeta summons one last attack: the Final Flash! Meanwhile, Trunks struggles to decide whether or not to help his father. Vegeta’s pride is at stake, but so is his life!
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: Saving Throw
episodes.description: Vegeta lies unconscious after his battle with Cell, and Trunks unleashes his hidden powers to save his father’s life. With Goku and Gohan still training, Trunks is the only person standing in the evil android’s way.
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: Ghosts from Tomorrow
episodes.description: Trunks vows to stop the future from repeating itself; Cell can’t wait for the future to unfold. It’s all up for grabs as the two warriors prepare for battle. Only one future will survive. Whose will it be?
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: The Cell Games
episodes.description: Realizing that his powers are no match for his opponent, Trunks accepts defeat, only to be given a second chance when Cell proposes a tournament! Is Cell really interested in competition, or does he have a sinister motive?
episodes.saga: Imperfect Cell and Perfect Cell Sagas (1992)

episodes.title: What is the Tournament?
episodes.description: While Trunks tells the others of Cell’s plans to hold a tournament, the diabolical android begins his preparations for the competition by constructing a fighting arena. Do the Z-Fighters have a chance, or is this a contest that only Cell can win?

episodes.title: The Doomsday Broadcast
episodes.description: Cell breaks into showbiz, literally! The sinister android hijacks a television station in order to announce his "Cell Games" to the world! But are there any challengers left with the strength and courage to get into the ring?

episodes.title: Meet Me in the Ring
episodes.description: Panicked Earthlings flee their homes to escape Cell’s wrath, but all hope is not lost! Back at the Lookout, Goku and Gohan finally emerge from the Time Chamber. After a quick trip to size up the competition, Goku is ready to battle Cell!

episodes.title: No Worries Here
episodes.description: With nine days until Cell's tournament begins, Vegeta, Piccolo, and Trunks plan to return to the Hyperbolic Time Chamber. But Goku decides that he and Gohan have had enough training! What does Goku know that the others don't?

episodes.title: A Girl Named Lime
episodes.description: Gohan stumbles upon a village that has retreated to a nearby shelter, and when he discovers that the owner of the shelter is capitalizing on the villagers' fear of Cell, he comes up with a Super Saiyan solution to the problem!

episodes.title: Memories of Gohan
episodes.description: As the Cell Games draw near, Goku enjoys his remaining time with friends and family! First he fishes with Krillin, then he strolls down memory lane with Chichi, and finally it's time for a very special boy to blow out the candles!

episodes.title: A New Guardian
episodes.description: When the Royal Military foolishly tries to stop Cell with ordinary weapons, the attack quickly becomes a suicide mission! Goku is determined to revive the fallen soldiers, but that will require new Dragon Balls!

episodes.title: Dende's Dragon
episodes.description: With help from King Kai, Goku travels to Namek to recruit a new guardian for the Earth! Most of the Namekians refuse the offer, but there’s one little guy who can’t wait to go! Dende is back, and he’s going to create a new Dragon!

episodes.title: The Puzzle of General Tao
episodes.description: Goku comes face to face with an old adversary: General Tao! The search for the Dragon Balls led Goku to the aging general, but unless the Super Saiyan can solve the crafty villain’s puzzle, the search may end in vain!

episodes.title: The Games Begin
episodes.description: The wait is over, and the Cell Games are ready to begin! The Z-Fighters arrive ringside, only to discover another challenger already on the scene. It’s none other than World Martial Arts Champion, Mr. Satan!

episodes.title: Losers Fight First
episodes.description: Caroni and Pirozhki, Mr. Satan’s top students, make a spectacular entrance to the ring, but are they really ready to rumble with Cell? Don’t miss a minute of the fun, because this fight could be over fast!

episodes.title: Goku vs. Cell
episodes.description: The main event begins! Now free of distraction, Goku steps into the ring to face Cell. The Earth shakes and the heavens tremble as these mighty super warriors collide! And that’s just the warm up!

episodes.title: Cell's Bag of Tricks
episodes.description: Cell attacks Goku with a dazzling array of moves: the Destructo Disk, the Special Beam Cannon, even the Kamehameha Wave! So far, Goku has been able to match Cell blow for blow, but how will the Super Saiyan fare against such a lethal arsenal?

episodes.title: No More Rules
episodes.description: As the battle intensifies, Cell quickly grows tired of the rules he created for the tournament. With a flick of his finger, the Android destroys the ring, instantly turning the Cell Games into a deadly fight to the finish!

episodes.title: The Fight is Over
episodes.description: Goku blasts Cell with a Kamehameha Wave that reduces the android to a pile of cinders, but his triumph is short-lived. The monster shows his amazing resilience by fully regenerating himself!

episodes.title: Faith in a Boy
episodes.description: After surrendering to Cell, Goku names the next challenger to enter the Cell Games: Gohan! Goku has supreme faith in his son’s abilities, but the young Saiyan will need a lot more than his father’s confidence if he’s going to survive!

episodes.title: Gohan's Plea
episodes.description: The fight between Gohan and Cell intensifies, but the villain’s attacks seem to have no effect on the boy! Could the young hero really have the power to defeat the evil android once and for all?

episodes.title: Android Explosion
episodes.description: Cell is determined to unleash Gohan’s full potential, but the boy refuses to fight, prompting the android to torture Gohan’s friends instead! Next, Cell does the unthinkable by spawning miniature Cells to attack the Z-Fighters!

episodes.title: Cell Juniors Attack!
episodes.description: Gohan boils with rage as the Cell Juniors wreak havoc on the Z-Fighters. The boy struggles to resist the urge to fight, but he’s a powder keg waiting to explode, and Android 16 appears ready to light the fuse!

episodes.title: Awakening
episodes.description: Spurred by Android 16’s dying words, Gohan’s hidden power is finally unleashed! With his new strength and speed, Gohan easily destroys the wicked Cell Juniors, but his sights are set on a bigger target!

episodes.title: The Unstoppable Gohan
episodes.description: Cell’s desire for battle turns into a nightmare as Gohan unleashes the full fury of his strength. The evil android powers up to his maximum level, but will it be enough to spare him from the wrath of Super Saiyan?

episodes.title: Cell's Break Down
episodes.description: Gohan’s Super Saiyan strength appears to have no limit, and the young hero delivers a blow so severe it causes Cell to cough up Android 18! As the monster wears down, Gohan prepares to end the battle once and for all!

episodes.title: A Hero's Farewell
episodes.description: Clearly overmatched by Gohan, Cell initiates his last line of defense: a self-destruct program that will blow up the entire planet! With only seconds to spare, Goku risks everything to transport Cell away from the Earth.

episodes.title: Cell Returns!
episodes.description: The nightmare continues! Cell explodes, but a particle of his nucleus survives the blast, providing all the android needs to regenerate himself! Restored to his ultimate form, Cell returns to the Earth more powerful than ever!

episodes.title: The Horror Won't End
episodes.description: After easily dispensing of both Trunks and Vegeta, Cell announces a new plan. First, he’ll destroy the Earth, and after that, the Universe will be his next target! Can this weapon of ultimate destruction be stopped?

episodes.title: Save the World
episodes.description: The final showdown begins! While Goku telepathically coaches Gohan from the Other World, the Z-Fighters jump in for a five-sided attack! Gohan has the potential inside him, but can Goku show him how to unlock it?

episodes.title: Goku's Decision
episodes.description: Cell is finally defeated, but the Z-Fighters still have much to resolve! Can they make it to the Lookout in time to heal the badly-injured Gohan? Is Android 18 still a threat? And can our heroes find a way to bring back Goku?

episodes.title: One More Wish
episodes.description: After Goku’s decision to stay in the after-world, Krillin uses the final wish to save Android 18, but does he have the courage to reveal his true feelings? And is anyone brave enough to break the news of Goku's passing to Chichi?!

episodes.title: Free the Future
episodes.description: Peace and order have been restored on Earth in the present, but Trunks’ future world is still a place of darkness and despair! Once he arrives home, the future will be forever changed!

episodes.title: Warriors of the Dead
episodes.description: When Goku hears about a martial arts master known as the Grand Kai, he rushes to meet him for a lesson! Meanwhile, Cell, Frieza, King Cold and the Ginyu Force have teamed up to take control of Other World!
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: Tournament Begins
episodes.description: Goku must train for 10,000 years before he can study under the Grand Kai! But when the West, South, and East Kai’s decide to hold an Other World Tournament, Goku gets his chance! All he has to do is defeat the greatest fighters of all time!
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: Water Fight
episodes.description: The Other World Tournament advances to the Quarter-Finals, and the battles are out of this world! Goku's opponent, Arqua, appears to be a wimp, but things change quickly when he transforms the entire ring into water!
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: Final Round
episodes.description: Goku advances to the final round of the tournament where he will face the warrior Pikkon! Sparks of energy fly as the brawlers battle for the title! When Pikkon reveals a Piccolo-like secret, Goku must up the ante! It's Super Saiyan time!
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: Goku vs. Pikkon
episodes.description: Goku may be a Super Saiyan, but can he withstand Pikkon's unbelievable Thunder Flash Attack?! And that's not all! While Goku's been fighting in Other World, seven years have passed on Earth, Gohan is now a teenager!
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: Gohan Goes to High School
episodes.description: On his first day of high school, Gohan stops a truckload of bank robbers by turning Super Saiyan. Now, the city can't stop talking about this mysterious "Gold Fighter!” Can Gohan get through class without revealing his secret identity?
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: I Am Saiyaman!
episodes.description: Afraid he’ll be recognized by his classmates, Gohan gets Bulma to design a retractable super-hero costume that he can activate in an instant. Say goodbye to Gohan - and hello to Saiyaman!
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: Gohan's First Date
episodes.description: Gohan thinks being a super-hero is a snap until a pretty girl named Angela discovers his secret. When Angela threatens to tell all unless he goes on a date with her, Gohan's life suddenly becomes more complicated than ever!
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: Rescue Videl
episodes.description: When the Red Shark Gang kidnaps the mayor and demands a showdown with Mr. Satan, it's Videl who answers the challenge. Gohan knows Videl is in over her head, but he can't leave his classroom to help her without blowing his cover!
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: Blackmail
episodes.description: When a greedy circus promoter kidnaps a baby dinosaur, all he sees are dollar signs! Little does he know, that the dinosaur is a close, personal friend of the Great Saiyaman!
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: I'll Fight Too!
episodes.description: Lights! Camera! Action! The Great Saiyaman is about to become a movie star! But the hero’s brush with stardom better not take long, because he has to hurry up and tell all of his old friends the big news: Goku’s coming back!
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: The Newest Super Saiyan
episodes.description: While training for the upcoming tournament, Gohan discovers that Goten has already reached the level of Super Saiyan! Sparks fly when the brothers spar, but the main event happens when Videl meets Chichi for the first time!
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: Take Flight, Videl
episodes.description: With the Tournament fast approaching, Videl and Goten must learn to fly! Miles away, Vegeta holds a training session of his own, and his young son, Trunks, has a big surprise in store for him
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: Gather for the Tournament
episodes.description: Videl learns to fly, and Gohan and Goten do some last minute honing of their Super Saiyan skills. On the island where the tournament will be held, a special guest arrives! What do you say to a hero who's been dead for seven years?!
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: Camera Shy
episodes.description: High school jock, Sharpner, discovers his crush, Videl, has her heart set on the mysterious Great Saiyaman! Refusing to be replaced, Sharpner vows to ruin the caped fighter by unmasking his true identity and capturing it on film!
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: The World Tournament
episodes.description: The action begins as the World Martial Arts Tournament opens with the Junior Division! Thirty-five young fighters vie for the prize, but the matches prove to be more comedy than competition - until Trunks steps into the ring!
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: Trunks vs. Goten
episodes.description: Goten and Trunks breeze through the Junior Division of the tournament until they find themselves going head-to-head in the finals! Who will win this exciting match? This is one championship fight you won't want to miss!
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: Best of the Boys
episodes.description: The match for the Junior Division World Championship continues as Goten and Trunks battle for the title! The winner of this final joust becomes the new World Champion! Can Goten outwit the cunning Trunks?
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: Big Trouble, Little Trunks
episodes.description: After winning the championship, Trunks fights an exhibition match against Mr. Satan! Can the Champ hold on to his reputation as the world's strongest fighter? Meanwhile, two mysterious figures reveal themselves to Goku!
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: Who Will Fight Who?
episodes.description: Trunks and Gohan infiltrate the adult competition at the tournament by donning the disguise of Mighty Mask. The pairings for the day’s matches are selected. The first to fight: Krillin vs. Pintar, a man easily ten times Krillin’s size!
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: Forfeit of Piccolo
episodes.description: Piccolo stuns the crowd by surrendering to his mysterious opponent before the first punch is thrown! Next into the ring is Videl, who must face the enormous Spopovitch. Will she be able to handle such a large job?
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: A Dark and Secret Power
episodes.description: Videl takes to the ring for what is expected to be an easy victory over Spopovitch. She hits the towering brute with everything she’s got, but her attacks have no effect. It seems Spopovitch is possessed by a supernatural power!
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: Videl Is Crushed
episodes.description: To everyone’s horror, Spopovitch delays his inevitable victory for the purposes of torturing Videl! It appears the muscle-bound thug isn’t going to stop until he kills her! Will Videl make it out of the ring alive?
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: Identities Revealed
episodes.description: Gohan’s identity is finally discovered as he takes his place on the tournament floor, but he has bigger things to worry about. His opponent, Kibito, is determined to see him transform into a Super Saiyan!
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: Energy Drain
episodes.description: When Gohan transforms into a Super Saiyan, Spopovitch and Yamu spring into action! Armed with a mysterious energy-draining device, the pair launch an attack on the golden-haired teen.
episodes.saga: Other World, Great Saiyaman and World Tournament Sagas (1993–94)

episodes.title: The Wizard's Curse
episodes.description: The Z-Fighters race to stop Babidi’s cronies from delivering the pure energy that will be used resurrect the dreaded Majin Buu. Will they find Babidi’s hidden spaceship in time?

episodes.title: King of the Demons
episodes.description: Piccolo and Krillin are turned to stone by Dabura! Determined to save their friends, Goku, Gohan, and Vegeta board Babidi’s ship only to find themselves trapped! Can they save their friends and find their way out?

episodes.title: Vegeta Attacks
episodes.description: At each stage of Babidi’s ship, Goku, Gohan, and Vegeta must face a fearsome warrior, each more powerful than the last. There’s no room for error! Even the tiniest mistake will enable Babidi to steal their energy for Majin Buu!

episodes.title: Next Up, Goku
episodes.description: Babidi unleashes his monster Yakon to steal the Z-Fighters’ energy for Majin Buu. The battle at Stage Two is sure to be intense, as Yakon is one of the most fearsome creatures in the universe!

episodes.title: Battle Supreme
episodes.description: At the World Martial Arts Tournament, the five remaining competitors enter the ring for an all-out Battle Royale! The fists fly as Number 18, Mighty Mask, and Mr. Satan duke it out to decide who will be the next Champion of the World!

episodes.title: Eighteen Unmasks
episodes.description: The battle heats up as Number 18 and Mighty Mask take their fight to the skies! Number 18 gives it everything she’s got, but her attacks prove useless against her masked opponent. Could she find the edge she needs to win?

episodes.title: Pay to Win
episodes.description: As the final bout of the tournament continues, Number 18 throws the defending champ for a loop by offering to throw the fight! Meanwhile, Babidi has selected his warrior for Stage 3: Dabura, King of the Demon World!

episodes.title: Heart of a Villain
episodes.description: The intense battle between Gohan and Dabura rages on, but just as the Stage 3 clash reaches a heated peak, Dabura stops the fight! Why has the evil giant conceded, and what is the great discovery he claims to have made?

episodes.title: The Dark Prince Returns
episodes.description: In an all-out assault against Vegeta, Babidi uses his power to undo the unsuspecting Prince from within! Vegeta is stripped of his good qualities by the wicked wizard, and becomes the heartless warrior that he once was!

episodes.title: Vegeta's Pride
episodes.description: Evil Vegeta gives Goku an ultimatum: fight - or watch him annihilate more innocent lives! Goku vows to settle the score between them once and for all, but the Supreme Kai steps between the Saiyans with a bold declaration!

episodes.title: The Long Awaited Fight
episodes.description: The battle between Goku and Vegeta has begun! With Babidi’s magic enhancing his already incredible strength, Vegeta matches Goku move for move, but every blow the Saiyan Prince lands is a boost for Majin Buu!

episodes.title: Magic Ball of Buu
episodes.description: With the fight between Goku and Vegeta supplying vast quantities of energy for Majin Buu, there’s not a moment to lose! Can Gohan muster up the strength to stop the evil wizard before it’s too late?

episodes.title: Buu Is Hatched
episodes.description: The seal encasing Buu is finally broken! Supreme Kai insists on retreat, but Gohan refuses, launching an incredible series of energy attacks. When the shell opens, nothing is inside! Gohan, however, knows it’s no time to celebrate.

episodes.title: The Losses Begin
episodes.description: With his big pink belly and infantile behavior, Buu doesn’t fit the bill of a galaxy destroyer - until he hurls Dabura into a cliff with a single blow! Gohan senses a limitless power, and the Supreme Kai insists this is the end!

episodes.title: The Terror of Mr. Buu
episodes.description: Supreme Kai must use his unique fighting powers to keep Buu at bay - or lose his life! One mile away, Goten and Trunks stumble upon Piccolo, still frozen in stone, and accidentally shatter him to pieces! And there’s more! The King of Demons returns!

episodes.title: Meal Time
episodes.description: Free from the grip of Babidi, Vegeta decides to seek his revenge by destroying the monster Majin Buu. Assuming Gohan to be a victim of the voracious villain, the Super Saiyan goes ballistic. Can Vegeta bring down Buu?

episodes.title: The Warrior's Decision
episodes.description: With Goku and Gohan missing in action, it’s up to Vegeta to end Majin Buu’s reign of terror. The Saiyan prince gives it his all, but Buu’s powers may be more than he can handle!

episodes.title: Final Atonement
episodes.description: Trunks and Goten save Vegeta from a savage beating, but the prideful prince is determined to destroy Majin Buu by himself. Vegeta is prepared to risk everything to defeat this foe, but is he really ready to give up his own life?

episodes.title: Evil Lives On
episodes.description: Majin Buu’s flesh is scattered on the battlefield, but his mystical power is rebuilding the monster into one deadly piece! Babidi is recovering, too, having narrowly survived Piccolo’s attack!

episodes.title: Find the Dragon Balls
episodes.description: Anxious to undo the massacre caused by Vegeta, Bulma and the others search frantically for the seven Dragon Balls! Meanwhile, the injured Goku finally awakens, and Dende uses his healing powers to bring him back to speed!

episodes.title: Revival
episodes.description: Goku hatches a plan for defeating Majin Buu: Fusion! By joining two fighters of equal size and strength, an entirely new fighter can be created. But only one such pair remains—Goten and Trunks! Can the young half-Saiyans save the world?

episodes.title: Global Announcement
episodes.description: Babidi seeks vengeance against Piccolo, Goten, and Trunks! Plastering images on everyone’s mind, Babidi threatens to terrorize humanity until the trio is brought forward! Meanwhile, Gohan is taken to Supreme Kai’s world!

episodes.title: Learn to Fuse!
episodes.description: Goku begins training Goten and Trunks in the art of Fusion. Meanwhile, Gohan, having been healed in Supreme Kai’s world, tries to remove the legendary Z-Sword to use in the fight against Majin Buu!

episodes.title: The Z Sword
episodes.description: Majin Buu launches into a feeding frenzy, transforming an entire town’s population into chocolate! Gohan draws the ancient Z-Sword, Goku struggles to teach Goten and Trunks the art of Fusion, and an unlikely hero is asked to join the fight!

episodes.title: Race to Capsule Corp.
episodes.description: As Goten and Trunks train to stop the vicious Majin Buu, Idasa’s jaded mother tells Babidi exactly where Trunks lives! The Z-Fighters must now find a way to stop the evil wizard before he reaches Capsule Corp!

episodes.title: Super Saiyan 3?!
episodes.description: Trunks searches frantically for the lost dragon radar, and Goku powers-up to an unimaginable level: Super Saiyan 3! Will this newfound strength be enough to stop Majin Buu from destroying West City?

episodes.title: Buu's Mutiny
episodes.description: Goku uses his new Super Saiyan 3 abilities to combat the evil Majin Buu, buying Trunks the time he needs to locate the missing Dragon Radar. But now that Goku has started the fight, he may not be able to escape!

episodes.title: The Fusion Dance
episodes.description: Liberated from his master, Majin Buu becomes even more destructive than before, wiping out entire cities in mere seconds! Earth’s only hope now rests on the shoulders of two young warriors: Goten and Trunks!

episodes.title: Goku's Time Is Up
episodes.description: Tensions rise for Goten and Trunks as their duel with Majin Buu approaches. Meanwhile, Buu prepares for the upcoming battle by building himself a home! Elsewhere, Goku bids a poignant farewell as he finally returns to Other World.

episodes.title: Return to Other World
episodes.description: While Trunks and Goten continue their quest to perfect the Fusion Technique, Gohan seeks to master the Z-Sword. Back on Earth, an encounter with a blind boy reveals that there is another side to the belligerent Buu!

episodes.title: Out from the Broken Sword
episodes.description: When Gohan’s intense training breaks the legendary Z-Sword, all hope seems lost until Old Kai emerges and from the legendary weapon. Who is this aged fellow, and does he really have the incredible power he claims to possess?

episodes.title: Gotenks Is Born
episodes.description: After many comical misfires, Trunks and Goten finally perfect the Fusion technique, and Gotenks is born! Defying Piccolo’s command, the super-kid immediately leaves to go fight Majin Buu! Is Gotenks ready for the fight of his young life?

episodes.title: Unlikely Friendship
episodes.description: As Majin Buu continues to terrorize humanity, a lone savior appears: Mr. Satan! His Megaton punch won’t be enough to stop the monster, but this unlikely hero may have a few surprises in store for Buu!

episodes.title: I Kill No More
episodes.description: While the Z-Fighters continue training in preparation for their battle with Majin Buu, Mr. Satan devises some sneakier plans to take the villain down. But will he even need to carry them out? Is Majin Buu having a change of heart?

episodes.title: The Evil of Men
episodes.description: When Mr. Satan inspires Majin Buu to give up his evil ways, it seems the professional pretender has really saved the world! But when a deranged madman suddenly spoils Buu’s good mood, the pink terror goes on another rampage!
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Buu Against Buu
episodes.description: The Battle of the Buus begins as Majin Buu fights his evil counterpart! The good Buu gets a taste of his own medicine when he’s turned into chocolate! Evil Buu gobbles him up, and a horrible transformation takes place! Who is this radical new Buu?
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Empty Planet
episodes.description: When the new and improved Majin Buu makes a surprise visit to the Lookout to challenge Gotenks, every second becomes a test of survival! And where are Trunks and Goten during the chaos that erupts?... Sound asleep, of course!
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Time Struggle
episodes.description: Before he can unleash his fury on the remaining Z-Fighters, Majin Buu is coaxed into the Hyperbolic Time Chamber. Inside, Trunks and Goten are training diligently, but will they have enough time to perfect their new moves before Majin Buu arrives?
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Super Moves of Gotenks
episodes.description: The long awaited rematch between Majin Buu and Gotenks begins! But when Gotenks’ fighting techniques come up short, he is forced to improvise - resulting in some of the craziest attack moves ever!
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Trapped in Forever
episodes.description: The battle between Gotenks and Majin Buu rages on inside the Hyperbolic Time Chamber. On the outside, family and friends wait anxiously for Gotenks and Piccolo to reappear. Can they successfully defeat Majin Buu and make it out alive?
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Feeding Frenzy
episodes.description: Powered by his insatiable hunger, Majin Buu escapes the Hyperbolic Time Chamber, leaving Piccolo and Gotenks trapped inside. Krillin and the gang are forced to fight the monster on their own. Will Buu finally make a meal out of the good guys?
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Gotenks Is Awesome!
episodes.description: Super Saiyan 3 Gotenks continues his fight with Majin Buu, and the Lookout is caught in the crossfire! As Gotenks turns up the power, so does Majin Buu - and by the time it’s over, one of them will be in way over his head!
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Unlucky Break
episodes.description: Gohan continues his training on the World of the Kais. Meanwhile, Gotenks briefly takes the upper hand in the battle with Majin Buu before his techniques begin to fall apart. Will Gohan be ready in time to step in and finish the fight?
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: A Whole New Gohan
episodes.description: When Gotenks’ fusion unravels, it appears the end has finally come for Goten and Trunks. But just as things seem their worst, Gohan descends on the scene with his newly awakened powers! Finally, the tables are turning on Majin Buu!
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Search for Survivors
episodes.description: After being dominated on the battlefield, Majin Buu blows himself up in a desperate attempt to destroy Gohan! But is this just a ploy? Gohan seems to think so! Is Majin Buu plotting an ambush or simply trying to buy a little time?
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Majin-Buu Transforms
episodes.description: Majin Buu reappears, ready for battle, but rather than continue his fight against Gohan, Buu stages a clever deception to absorb Gotenks and Piccolo. With the wisdom of Piccolo and the power of Super Saiyan Gotenks, Buu transforms into “Super Buu!”
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: The Old Kai's Weapon
episodes.description: After absorbing Piccolo and Gotenks, Majin Buu’s powers have increased exponentially! Armed with some new tricks, Majin Buu is poised for global destruction. Now that Gohan is alone and weakening, is there anyone who can stop the monster?
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Ready to Fuse?
episodes.description: Goku watches helplessly from Other World as Majin Buu sets his sights on Gohan. Luckily the Old Kai reveals a secret source of power that could save the day. Is Goku ready to bond with his son and put an end to Majin Buu’s reign of terror?
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Union of Rivals
episodes.description: After Majin Buu absorbs Gohan, Goku’s plan to join forces with his son is ruined. But an unlikely ally arrives on the scene—Vegeta! Will the Saiyan Prince put aside his differences and agree to merge with Goku?
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Meet Vegito
episodes.description: The bodies of Goku and Vegeta join to form a new Saiyan warrior. The monster Majin Buu is impressed by the strength of his new opponent, but refuses to take him seriously. Will Majin Buu’s arrogance be his undoing?
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Rip in the Universe
episodes.description: The newly-formed Saiyan warrior Super Vegito matches Majin Buu punch for punch. But the monster’s new opponent stirs up an uncontrollable anger within the very heart of the beast. Will Majin Buu’s frenzy mean the end of planet Earth?
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Vegito... Downsized
episodes.description: The battle rages on between Vegito and Majin Buu! The Super Saiyan Combo seems to have the fight well in hand. But is Vegito tempting fate by toying with Buu? What terrible tricks does the wily, pink monster still have up his sleeve?
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: The Incredible Fighting Candy
episodes.description: Having been reduced to a coffee-flavored candy, it seems nothing can stop Vegito from being consumed by the evil Majin Buu. But when the gumdrop fights back, Buu realizes that the battle is far from over!
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: The Innards of Buu
episodes.description: When Majin Buu absorbs Vegito, the fused Saiyan separates into Goku and Vegeta once again. Deep within the villain, they reveal their plan to rescue Gohan and the others. Can the duo survive the digestive process and carry out their mission?
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Mind Trap
episodes.description: Dangers abound as Goku and Vegeta continue their search for Gohan and inside of Majin Buu’s body! After meeting some disgusting bedfellows, they finally find what they’re looking for as they enter Majin Buu’s head!
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Deadly Vision
episodes.description: Goku and Vegeta reunite the others only to be attacked by Majin Buu! The showdown proves that fighting Buu inside his own head is a mind-bending experience. Can Goku and Vegeta survive in this twisted house of horrors where all is Buu?
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Evil Kid Buu!
episodes.description: When Super Buu’s body begins to mutate once again, Goku and Vegeta have to get out fast! But what awaits them should they manage to escape? What will the insidious Buu turn into next?
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: End of Earth
episodes.description: After the cords of attachment to the roly-poly Buu are cut by Vegeta, Majin Buu should mutate into a much weaker form. But instead he gets even stronger! This baffles everyone but Kibito Kai, who discloses Majin Buu's bizarre history!
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: True Saiyans Fight Alone
episodes.description: With Earth erased from existence, Majin Buu begins his search for Goku and Vegeta, leaving entire worlds destroyed in his wake. But when Buu's hunt leads him to the World of the Kais, Goku and Vegeta draw the line!
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Battle for the Universe Begins
episodes.description: With Majin Buu ready for a fight, Kibito Kai is stunned to see Goku and Vegeta playing a game of Rock, Paper, Scissors! Rather than use the Fusion Technique to join their powers, the duo has decided to fight Buu one at a time!
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Vegeta's Respect
episodes.description: When Super Saiyan 3 Goku collapses from exhaustion, Vegeta enters the fight, but he doesn’t last long! Just as Majin Buu is about to deliver the deathblow, Goku makes a comeback!
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Minute of Desperation
episodes.description: Goku's powers are fading, and he must end the battle before it's too late! Enter Vegeta, who begins a furious battle with Buu to buy Goku the time needed to gather energy. Outclassed by his opponent, can the Saiyan Prince survive!?
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Old Buu Emerges
episodes.description: When Vegeta falls, Mr. Satan steps in to take up the challenge! It appears the wannabe hero has signed his death warrant, but when Buu attempts to attack, the monster is crippled by agony!
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Earth Reborn
episodes.description: As good Majin Buu wages an all-out war against his evil counterpart, Vegeta asks Dende to summon the Dragon on the new Planet Namek. With the good Buu's power dwindling, will Vegeta have enough time to carry out the final phase of his plan?
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Call to Action
episodes.description: Goku awaits the arrival of the Earthlings’ collective energy to vitalize the Spirit Bomb, but the energy isn’t coming! Have the people of the Earth turned a deaf ear to Vegeta’s plea for help at this most critical hour?
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: People of Earth Unite
episodes.description: The foolish Earthlings ignore Goku, but when Mr. Satan asks for help, the humans have a change of heart. Will their outpouring of energy arrive in time? Goku can only wait and watch as Vegeta crumbles under the might of Majin Buu!
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Spirit Bomb Triumphant
episodes.description: After the good Buu and Mr. Satan free Vegeta, Goku launches the Spirit Bomb! Unfortunately, the weary Saiyan doesn’t have enough power to deliver the blast, and Buu sends it right back at him! Will Goku be destroyed by his own attack?
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Celebrations with Majin Buu
episodes.description: When Goku and his companions return to Earth after defeating Majin Buu, they are welcomed with open arms. But nobody is happy to see the good Buu! Can Mr. Satan’s pink pal manage to fit into society? Or is he destined to become an outcast?
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: He's Always Late
episodes.description: Goku has his hands full guarding four dragon eggs from the dangers of the wild, but even if he can save the baby dragons, he will soon face an even more dangerous peril: an angry Chi Chi!
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Granddaughter Pan
episodes.description: It’s been ten years since the demise of evil Majin Buu, and Earth is once again at peace. Gohan is a scholar. Trunks and Goten are strong, young teenagers! Vegeta and Bulma have a new daughter! And Goku is a grandfather!
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Buu's Reincarnation
episodes.description: A new World Tournament is set to begin! With help from Majin Buu, Goku rigs the drawing so he faces a mysterious fighter in the first round of the finals! Is this timid, little village boy called Uub really as strong as Goku thinks?
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: Goku's Next Journey
episodes.description: Uub grows stronger as the battle rages, soon becoming the Saiyan’s equal, but before the match is decided, Goku makes a startling revelation! With his plan revealed, Goku and Uub depart the arena, leaving a stunned crowd in their wake.
episodes.saga: Fusion, Kid Buu and Peaceful World Sagas (1995–96)

episodes.title: A Peacetime Reward; Who Gets the 100,000,000 Zeni!?
