episodes.description: Goku is farming with Goten when Mr. Satan tries to give him 100 Million Zeni! Goten and Trunks try to find a gift to Videl.

episodes.title: To the Promised Resort! Vegeta Takes a Family Trip!?
episodes.description: Vegeta and his family go on a family trip while Goku trains. Beerus remembers the Super Saiyan God in his dream.

episodes.title: Where Does the Dream Pick Up!? Find the Super Saiyan God!
episodes.description: Beerus and Whis track down the Super Saiyan God. Meanwhile, Bulma and her friends set up her birthday party.

episodes.title: Bid for the Dragon Balls! Pilaf and Crew's Impossible Mission!
episodes.description: The Pilaf Gang end up at Bulma's birthday party to steal the Dragon Balls, but they are sidetracked. Meanwhile, Goku trains on Kaio's planet.

episodes.title: Showdown on King Kai's World! Goku vs. Beerus the Destroyer!
episodes.description: While Goku is training, Beerus shows up at Kaio's planet. Goku suggests that they fight against Kaio's wishes, but Goku is later beaten by Beerus as a Super Saiyan 3.

episodes.title: Don't Anger the Destroyer! A Heart-Pounding Birthday Party
episodes.description: Beerus arrives at Bulma's birthday party, and Vegeta tries his best to keep the God of Destruction under wraps for the time being.

episodes.title: How Dare You Do That to My Bulma! Vegeta's Metamorphosis of Fury!?
episodes.description: The Z-Fighters attempt to subdue Beerus after he gets angry, to no avail. Vegeta transforms out of rage after witnessing Bulma get slapped.

episodes.title: Goku Makes an Entrance! A Last Chance from Lord Beerus?
episodes.description: An enraged Vegeta fights Beerus, but is overwhelmed. Later, Beers wins a rock-paper-scissors contest against Oolong, and decides to destroy Earth. Before he can, Goku returns.

episodes.title: Thanks for Waiting, Lord Beerus! A Super Saiyan God is Born at Last!
episodes.description: After Goku asks Beerus for more time, they summon Shen Long to find out how to achieve the Super Saiyan God form. They perform the ritual and Goku becomes a Super Saiyan God.

episodes.title: Show Us, Goku! The Power of a Super Saiyan God!
episodes.description: After successfully becoming a Super Saiyan God, Goku challenges Beerus to another fight.

episodes.title: Let's Keep Going, Lord Beerus! The Battle of Gods!
episodes.description: The battle between gods continues.

episodes.title: The Universe Will Shatter? Clash! Destroyer vs. Super Saiyan God!
episodes.description: The destructive power of Goku and Beerus' fight puts the entire universe in danger.

episodes.title: Goku, Surpass Super Saiyan God!
episodes.description: Although Goku loses the Super Saiyan God form, he absorbs and retains its power, and continues to fight Beerus.

episodes.title: This is All the Power I've Got! A Settlement Between Gods
episodes.description: The fight between Goku and Beerus reaches its climactic end.

episodes.title: Valiant Mr. Satan, Work a Miracle! A Challenge from Outer Space!
episodes.description: After the battle with Beerus wraps up, a terrible visitor comes to Satan!?

episodes.title: Vegeta Becomes a Student?! Win Over Whis!
episodes.description: With the battle over, one day Kuririn visits Goku. His unexpected request is…!? Meanwhile, Vegeta tries to convince Whis to make him one of his students by…?

episodes.title: Pan is Born! And Goku Goes on a Training Journey?!
episodes.description: Some time has passed on Earth. Gohan and Videl’s daughter is finally born!!

episodes.title: I'm Here, Too! Training Commences on Beerus' World
episodes.description: Goku departs Earth and begins training under Whis. The surprising training method is…!?

episodes.title: Despair Redux! The Return of the Evil Emperor, Frieza!
episodes.description: Sorbet is eager to revive Frieza and receives the help of Pilaf and his gang.

episodes.title: A Warning from Jaco! Frieza and 1,000 Soldiers Close In
episodes.description: Jaco travels to Earth to give out a warning of Frieza's arrival.

episodes.title: The Start of Vengeance! The Frieza Force's Malice Strikes Gohan!
episodes.description: Frieza's forces begin their raid on Planet Earth. Goku and Vegeta, oblivious to what is happening on Earth, continue their training under Whis.

episodes.title: Change! An Unexpected Return! His Name is Ginyu!!
episodes.description: Ginyu switches bodies with Tagoma and wreaks havoc on the Z-Fighters

episodes.title: Earth! Gohan! Both on the Ropes! Hurry and Get Here, Goku!!
episodes.description: Goku and Vegeta hear of Frieza's return and quickly teleport to Earth.

episodes.title: Clash! Frieza vs. Goku! This is the Result of My Training!
episodes.description: Goku and Frieza go one-on-one. Goku wants to reveal his true power, and so he transforms...

episodes.title: A Full-Throttle Battle! The Vengeful Golden Frieza
episodes.description: Frieza reveals his new evolution and the battle truly begins.

episodes.title: A Chance Appears in a Tight Spot! Launch a Counteroffensive, Goku!
episodes.description: The battle continues as Frieza's weakness begins to make itself obvious.

episodes.title: The Earth Explodes? A Decisive Kamehameha!
episodes.description: With Goku badly injured, Vegeta steps in to face Frieza. Stronger than ever, Vegeta proves to be a challenge and an enraged Frieza destroys the planet! Protected by Whis, the Z-Fighters are given a chance to save Earth, if they act fast enough.

episodes.title: The 6th Universe's Destroyer! His Name is Champa!
episodes.description: While training on Beerus' Planet, Goku and Vegeta meet Beerus' twin brother Champa.

episodes.title: Combat Matches Are a Go! The Captain is Someone Stronger Than Goku
episodes.description: Beerus and Champa decided to hold a tournament between their universes to settle who gets to use the Super Dragon Balls.

episodes.title: A Run-Through For the Competition! Who Are the Last Two Members?
episodes.description: Goku and Vegeta go find the two remaining members for Team Universe 7.

episodes.title: Off to See Master Zuno! Find Out Where the Super Dragon Balls Are!
episodes.description: Jaco and Bulma visit Zuno to learn more about the Super Dragon Balls.

episodes.title: The Matches Begin! We're All Off to the Planet with No Name!
episodes.description: The tournament between Universe 6 and Universe 7 begins! The first match is going underway.

episodes.title: Surprise, 6th Universe! This is Super Saiyan Goku!
episodes.description: It's Goku versus Botamo! After Goku's victory, he faces Frost, Universe 6's version of Frieza. Who wins the match...?

episodes.title: Piccolo vs Frost! Stake it All on the Special Beam Cannon!
episodes.description: The next contestant for Team Universe 7 is Piccolo. Frost is doing what?!

episodes.title: Turn Your Anger into Strength! Vegeta's Full-Bore Battle
episodes.description: Vegeta battles Frost. After a short-lived fight, Vegeta is challenged by Magetta.

episodes.title: An Unexpectedly Uphill Battle! Vegeta's Great Blast of Fury!
episodes.description: Vegeta is struggling during his match with Magetta. What is Magetta doing to Vegeta?!

episodes.title: Don't Forget Your Saiyan Pride! Vegeta vs. The 6th Universe's Saiyan!
episodes.description: The next match is between Vegeta and the Saiyan from Universe 6, Cabba. What secret power does Cabba possess?

episodes.title: The 6th Universe's Mightiest Warrior! Engage the Assassin Hit!
episodes.description: The final contestant for Universe 6 is the confident, legendary assassin, Hit. Does Vegeta stand a chance?

episodes.title: A Developed "Time Skip" Counterstrike? Here Comes Goku's New Move!
episodes.description: The battle between Goku and Hit continues, however, Hit proves to be more formidable than anticipated.

episodes.title: A Decision at Last! Is the Winner Beerus? Or is it Champa?
episodes.description: The winner of the tournament between Universe 6 and 7 is decided!

episodes.title: Come Forth, Divine Dragon! And Grant My Wish, Peas and Carrots!
episodes.description: As the winners of the Tournament Universe 7 are given the Super Dragon Balls and make summon the Dragon for their wish.

episodes.title: A Chaotic Victory Party! Showdown at Last? Monaka vs. Goku!
episodes.description: The Tournament may be over, but Goku still wants to battle Monaku to see how really strong he is. While Beers and the rest of Dragon Ball Cast try and keep his secret hidden from Goku.

episodes.title: Goku's Energy is Out of Control? The Struggle to Look After Pan
episodes.description: Pan is kidnapped thought to be defenseless by her captors, but as it turned out, the plan backfired.

episodes.title: The Seal of Planet Pot-au-feu; Secrets of the Unleashed Superhuman Water!
episodes.description: While Monaka delivers super sweets of the Galaxy to Bulma, Trunks and Goten end up locking themselves in his truck. Finding trouble on a planet Pot-au-feu, Where Vegeta and Jaco have to go and rescue them.

episodes.title: Vegeta Disappears?! Menace of the Duplicate Vegeta!
episodes.description: With Vegeta losing all of his power to the copy of himself that was made from Superhuman Water, it is up to Goten and Trunks to defeat him. Mean while Goku is back at full health and training at Kaio's planet.

episodes.title: Goku vs. the Duplicate Vegeta! Which One is Going to Win?
episodes.description: The battle between Goku and Duplicate Vegeta Continues. Will Goku defeat the copy in time to save Vegeta?

episodes.title: SOS from the Future: A Dark New Enemy Appears!
episodes.description: In the timeline of Future Trunks, a new enemy appears that requires him to return to the past and get help from the Z-Fighters.

episodes.title: HOPE!! Redux: Awaken in the Present, Trunks
episodes.description: Much to everyone's surprise, a war-torn and unconscious Future Trunks arrives in the past after evading Black.

episodes.title: A Message From the Future - The Incursion of Goku Black!
episodes.description: After awakening in the present, Future Trunks mistakes Goku for his evil look-alike Black.

episodes.title: Goku vs. Black! A Closed-Off Road to the Future
episodes.description: Goku Black invades from Trunks' future! Excited to fight a strong opponent, Goku immediately challenges him to one-on-one combat, but Goku Black isn't taking the fight seriously?!

episodes.title: Feelings That Transcend Time: Trunks and Mai
episodes.description: Bulma finds the Time Machine that Cell used to travel to the past and promptly gathers the team to repair it. Future Trunks and Mai discuss their counterparts from alternate timelines.

episodes.title: Master and Pupil Reunited! Gohan and Future Trunks!
episodes.description: Piccolo mentions that Gohan decided to abandon his training to become a scholar, which suprised Future Trunks. Piccolo and Kuririn suggest that Future Trunks should meet their timeline's Gohan.

episodes.title: Uncover Black's Identity! Off to the 10th Universe's World of the Kai!
episodes.description: Goku, Beerus, and Whis arrive in Universe Ten. They meet the Supreme Kai Gowasu and his apprentice Zamasu.

episodes.title: He Who is of Saiyan Blood: Trunks's Resolve
episodes.description: Vegeta wants to test Future Trunks' power to see how strong his son had become.

episodes.title: I'd Like to See Goku, You See! A Summons From Grand Zeno!
episodes.description: Whis and Beerus are worried over Zen-Oh's request to meet Goku and what it could mean for their universe.

episodes.title: Rematch with Goku Black! Enter Super Saiyan Rosé
episodes.description: Goku and Vegeta appear in the future to fight Goku Black, but they find that he has developed a new power.

episodes.title: A God with an Invincible Body - The Advent of Zamasu
episodes.description: Zamasu appears unexpectedly from the sky. He states that he and Goku Black are "kindred spirits" who want a world without mortals.

episodes.title: Zamasu and Black - The Duo's Mystery Deepens
episodes.description: Defeated, Son Goku, Vegeta and Trunks travel to the present, in order to find a way to defeat Zamasu. We also witness a developing relating to the mystery between Black and Zamasu.

episodes.title: Protect The Supreme Kai Gowasu - Destroy Zamasu!
episodes.description: Goku, Beerus and Whis must save Gowasu from his treacherous apprentice.

episodes.title: Into the Future Once Again - Goku Black's True Identity Revealed!
episodes.description: Trunks returns to the future, with Goku and his parents accompanying him. There they discover Goku Black still lives, and he explains how he defied space and time to exist.

episodes.title: Zamasu's Ambition – The Storied "Project 0 Mortals" of Terror
episodes.description: Goku, Vegeta and Future Trunks fight Black and Zamasu in the future. Black explains his true identity.

episodes.title: I Will Defend the World! Trunks' Furious Burst of Super Power!
episodes.description: With his new found power, Trunks attempts to hold off Black and Zamasu. Meanwhile, Goku and Vegeta head back to the past to try come up with a new strategy.

episodes.title: Don't You Disgrace Saiyan Cells! Vegeta's Fierce Battle Commences!
episodes.description: Trunks wakes up in a rebel base only to find out that Mai set off on her own in an attempt to take out Black. Will he make it in time to save her?

episodes.title: Worship Me! Give Praise Unto Me! The Explosive Birth of a Merged Zamasu!
episodes.description: As the battle rages on in the future, Bulma and Trunks devise a plan to take down Zamasu, meanwhile, Vegeta shows his new-found strength while taking on Goku Black.

episodes.title: Final Judgement? The Ultimate Power of an Absolute God
episodes.description: The two zamasu fuse and become the ultimate god. Meanwhile vegeta, goku and others are stunned and try to somehow defeat the eternal god.

episodes.title: Showdown! The Miraculous Power of Unyielding Warriors
episodes.description: After Goku's attack shakes Zamazu's balance and reveal a weakness in him, he and Vegeta fuse together as they see hope to prevail. Nevertheless, It's Trunks's world and to him it all ultimately comes down.

episodes.title: With New Hope in His Heart - Farewell, Trunks
episodes.description: Zamasu makes one final almighty move to destroy the universe, but Goku brings out a forgotten but all-powerful ally to stop him.

episodes.title: Come Forth, Shenron! Whose Wish Will Be Granted?
episodes.description: Goku decides to summon Shenron to honor a promise, but his friends have things they want to wish for too.

episodes.title: Goku vs. Arale! An Off-the-Wall Battle Spells the End of the Earth?
episodes.description: Goku and the android girl Arale Norimaki meet after many years, in a fun-filled episode where the cast of Dr Slump and DBZ meet.

episodes.title: A Challenge From Champa! This Time, a Baseball Game!
episodes.description: Chanpa returns, and offers a baseball game between him and Beerus.

episodes.title: Goku Dies! An Assassination That Must Be Executed!
episodes.description: Hit gets a contract to kill Goku, and prepares his assassination.

episodes.title: Will He Strike Back? The Unseen Killing Technique!
episodes.description: Goku manages to come back to life, but he seeks a fight with Hit. And who is the client who put Hit to fight Goku?

episodes.title: Gohan's Plight! The Preposterous Great Saiyaman Film Adaptation?!
episodes.description: A film of the Great Saiyaman is to be made, and Gohan is to be in it - to his chagrin, as a stuntman.

episodes.title: For My Beloved Ones! The Indomitable Great Saiyaman!
episodes.description: Barry Kahn's attempts to sabotage Gohan get lethal when the alien parasite Watagash takes control of him.

episodes.title: Goku and Krillin! Back to the Old Familiar Training Ground!
episodes.description: Krillin decides to train with Goku after a police battle goes bad, but can he match up to the Saiyan's level?

episodes.title: Conquer the Terrifying Foes! Krillin's Fighting Spirit Rebounds!
episodes.description: Goku and Krillin fight against their old enemies such as Frieza and Cell in a form of nightmares in a mystical forest Master Roshi sent them to in order to fetch him a special herb.

episodes.title: Let's Do It, Grand Zeno! The Universes' Best Tournament!!
episodes.description: Goku goes and sees Zen-O to get the Tournament of Power going.

episodes.title: Even the Universes' Gods are Appalled?! The Lose-and-Perish Tournament of Power
episodes.description: Goku gets an invitation to the Tournament of Power, an epic tournament between universes.

episodes.title: The 9th Universe's Kicking Basil vs. the 7th Universe's Majin Buu!!
episodes.description: Majin Buu and Basil the Kicker continue to give Zen-Chan a show while they unravel the fight.

episodes.title: Awaken Your Dormant Fighting Spirit! Gohan's Fight!
episodes.description: With Majin Buu and Basil's battle concluded, Gohan is the next warrior of Universe 7 to fight. The rusty warrior's opponent is Universe 9's Lavendar. Lavender, however, has a trick up his sleeve.

episodes.title: Bergamo the Crusher vs. Goku! Whose Strength Reaches the Wild Blue Yonder?
episodes.description: The greatest fighters of Universes 7 and 9, Goku and Bergamo, face off.

episodes.title: Goku Must Pay! The Warrior of Justice Top Barges In!
episodes.description: After Goku won his battle against Bergamo, Toppo from Universe 11 challenges Goku for a fight.

episodes.title: Field the All-7th-Universe Team! Who are the Mighty Ten?
episodes.description: With the Zen-O Exhibition Match concluded and 48 hours until the Tournament of Power, Goku and Gohan search for the 10 warriors needed to complete Universe 7's team.

episodes.title: Goku the Talent Scout! Recruit Krillin and Android 18
episodes.description: Goku and Gohan recruit Krillin to join the Tournament of Power.

episodes.title: The Universes Go Into Action - Each With Their Own Motives
episodes.description: Goku searches for Majin Buu, as the Supreme Kais of each universe hold a secret meeting without Universe 7.

episodes.title: First Time Exchanging Blows! Android 17 vs. Goku!!
episodes.description: Goku travels to an isolated wildlife preserve run by Android 17, and attempts to recruit him for the Tournament of Power.

episodes.title: Hunt the Poaching Ring! Goku and Android 17's Joint Struggle!
episodes.description: Goku helps Android 17 pursue poachers from outer space.

episodes.title: Gohan and Piccolo Master and Pupil Clash in Max Training!
episodes.description: In preparation for the tournament, Piccolo trains Gohan so that he may awaken the power he had long ago.

episodes.title: A Mysterious Beauty Appears! The Enigma of the Tien Shin-Style Dojo?
episodes.description: Goku arrives at the dojo run by Tienshinhan to recruit him for the Tournament of Power.

episodes.title: Staring Down the Wall to be Overcome! Goku vs. Gohan
episodes.description: Gohan tests his powers he rediscovered in an exhibition match against Goku. Gohan forces Goku to transform into Super Sayan God Blue.

episodes.title: Which Universe Will Win Their Place? The Mighty Warriors Gradually Assemble!
episodes.description: The Warriors that are participating in the tournament are gathering while the tournament draws near other universes are gathering their warriors too.

episodes.title: A State of Emergency! Failure to Reach Ten Members!!
episodes.description: While each of the Universes prepare for the Tournament of Power in their own ways, Universe 7 gets in a pinch when they learn Majin Buu will be unable to enter the competition.

episodes.title: You're Our Tenth Warrior! Goku Approaches Frieza!!
episodes.description: In a desperate move to keep the roster for the Tournament, Goku decides to revive his archenemy Frieza so he can compete.

episodes.title: The Evil Emperor Returns! A Reception from Mysterious Assassins?
episodes.description: Frieza is resurrected. However, a group of assassins come for him and Goku.

episodes.title: Most Heinous! Most Evil! Frieza's Rampage!
episodes.description: Frieza goes on a rampage against the assassins sent to take him out. But if he takes too long, Universe 7 is disqualified and erased from the Tournament.

episodes.title: The Time Has Come! To the Null Realm with the Universes on the Line!
episodes.description: The Tournament of Power is finally about to begin. Goku and the rest of the team head to the World of Void, site of the battle stage.

episodes.title: Survive! The "Tournament of Power" Begins at Last!!
episodes.description: The 80 warriors assemble in the fighting arena in the World of Void and the curtain rises on the battle for survival.

episodes.title: Ah, the Uncertainty! A Universe Despairs!
episodes.description: The Universe 7 team is hit by a concentrated attack from the other universes.

episodes.title: Show Them! Krillin's Underlying Strength!
episodes.description: The Universes get a taste of what it's like to be erased, after universe 9 is wiped out of existence, Krillin begins showcasing his newly-found powers. Universe 7 loses it's first participant.

episodes.title: Rampage! A Crazed Warrior's Savagery Awakens!
episodes.description: Kale unleashes her berserk Saiyan ability, but endangers her fellow teammates.

episodes.title: Warriors of Justice Close In! The Pride Troopers!
episodes.description: The Pride Troopers of Universe 11 launch an assault on Goku's team.

episodes.title: The Power of Love Explodes? The 2nd Universe's Witchy Warriors!
episodes.description: The Universe 2 lady fighters make their move.

episodes.title: Gohan, Get Ruthless! Showdown with the 10th Universe!
episodes.description: Gohan goes up against Universe 10 warriors.

episodes.title: A Transcendent Light-Speed Battle Erupts! Goku and Hit's United Front!
episodes.description: Hit and Dispo begin to fight at the speed of light. Hit is disadvantaged when Goku comes to help.

episodes.title: A Valiant Fight! Master Roshi's Blaze of Glory!
episodes.description: Master Roshi takes on the fighters of Universe 4.

episodes.title: Find them Out! Deathmatch with a Furtive Attacker!
episodes.description: An unknown sniper with incredible aim launches a stealth attack in the Tournament.

episodes.title: Revenge 'F'! A Cunning Trap is Set?
episodes.description: Frost recalls how Champa promised to pardon his crimes if he humiliated and defeated Universe 7.

episodes.title: Frieza and Frost! A Mutual Malevolence?
episodes.description: As Gohan Struggles, Freeza and Frost appear... together they approach Gohan! What!?

episodes.title: The Mightiest Enemy Zeroes in on Goku! Launch the Knockout Spirit Bomb Now!
episodes.description: The Tournament of Power is now half over, and Jiren finally attacks.  Goku is forced to Super Saiyan Blue to keep pace with the overwhelming power of the 11th Universes most powerful warrior.

episodes.title: Goku Enkindled! The Awakened One's New Ultra Instinct!
episodes.description: After a surprise counter by Jiren, Goku disappears inside the blast of his spirit bomb. Will this be the end for Universe 7?!

episodes.title: An Extra-Dimensional Ultimate Battle! Hit vs. Jiren!
episodes.description: Hit uses his time-skip powers against Jiren and pools all his energy in a final attack to defeat him. Is this the end of Jiren?!

episodes.title: A Saiyan Oath! Vegeta's Resolve!
episodes.description: Vegeta and Cabba stand to face Monna from Universe 4 to show the power of the proud warrior race.

episodes.title: With Great Joy! The Fighting Freak Saiyans' Battle Rejoined!
episodes.description: Exhausted from his battle with jiren, Goku and Caulifla fight.  Goku doesn’t have the strength to transform into a Super Saiyan yet, but he slowly gains his strength back during their fight.

episodes.title: Bloodcurdling! The Explosive Birth of a New Super Warrior!
episodes.description: Kale controls that fierce power and becomes a true legendary Super Saiyan!

episodes.title: Goku vs. Kefla! Super Saiyan Blue Beaten?
episodes.description: Kefla was born from the Potara fusion.  Her power and speed are unbelievable!  Goku has to fight Kefla using his Blue Kiao Ken in the Ultimate Saiyan showdown!

episodes.title: Signs of a Turnabout! The Autonomous Ultra Instinct Erupts!
episodes.description: Goku unleashes stupendous ki.  In his battle with Kafla, he has once more reached Ultra Instinct.  His body unconsciously dodges Kafla's attacks, which triggers her to launch an even fiercer assault.  Then after avoiding her attack, Goku fires a Kamehameha at point-blank range!

episodes.title: Showdown of Love! The Androids vs the 2nd Universe!
episodes.description: Ribrianne targets Goku right as he's worn out from an intense battle!  But then 17 and 18 appear!  18 takes Goku's place and challenges Ribrianne to one-on-one combat, while 17 takes on Rozie.  Can the two of them prevail against Universe 2's strongest?!

episodes.title: Accelerating Tragedy - Vanishing Universes
episodes.description: Gohan and Piccolo's tough fight!  Gohan and Piccolo struggle against the desperate attacks of Universe 6's final warriors, Saonel and Pirina!  Piccolo therefore thinks up a method of attack their opponents won't expect.

episodes.title: Unavoidable? The Ferocity of a Stealth Attack!
episodes.description: The Tournament of Power Continues and Universe 7 takes on Universe 4.

episodes.title: A Perfect Survival Strategy! The 3rd Universe's Menacing Assassin!
episodes.description: Universe 3's Menacing Assassins attack Universe 7.

episodes.title: All-Out War! The Ultimate Four-Fold Union vs. the 7th Universe's Total Offensive!
episodes.description: Universe 7's all-out war begins with the quadruple Merge from Universe 3 named Aniraza. Goku and all his team members take on the new opponent.

episodes.title: With His Pride on the Line! Vegeta's Challenge to Be the Strongest!
episodes.description: With 7 minutes remaining the fight to determine who will survive, Vegeta challenges the strongest warrior Jiren.  What!?

episodes.title: Body, Soul and Power Unleashed! Goku and Vegeta!
episodes.description: Vegeta puts his full power in display against the mighty warrior Jiren of Universe 11, but can he hold his ground against him?

episodes.title: A Storm-and-Stress Assault! Gohan's Last Stand!
episodes.description: Frieza is about to eliminate Dyspo, but Dyspo suddenly shows his true power. Can Universe 7 be able to defeat this warrior with Lightning Speed?

episodes.title: A Commanding Presence! The Advent of Top the Destroyer!
episodes.description: The Battle continues between Toppo and Android 17 but Toppo displays the power of a God of Destruction. Can this obstacle be destroyed?

episodes.title: Surpass Even a God! Vegeta's Sacrifice Strike!
episodes.description: Vegeta displays his full power against Toppo in this high heated Match. Can Vegeta be able to defeat him with his Final Trick?

episodes.title: The Approaching Wall! A Hopeful Final Barrier!
episodes.description: Android 17, Vegeta, Goku and Frieza maximize their struggle to defeat Jiren. Jiren releases his hidden power that surprises everyone. Android 17 shows Jiren his bravery and tries to mentally steer him into defeat. 17, protects Vegeta and Goku from a lethal attack from Jiren.

episodes.title: With Noble Pride to the End! Vegeta Falls!
episodes.description: While Goku tries to master the Ultra Instinct, Vegeta still fights Jiren with everything he's got.

episodes.title: A Transcendent Limit Break! Autonomous Ultra Instinct Mastered!
episodes.description: A super heated battle for survival continues. With Jiren puttin Goku on the ropes even after he awakens ultra instict Goku surrpasses his limits once again by mastering the ultra instict.

episodes.title: The Greatest Showdown of All Time! The Ultimate Survival Battle!
episodes.description: The climactic battle to decide the fate of Universe 7 continues as Goku, now mastering Ultra Instinct, fights Jiren at his full power.

episodes.title: A Miraculous Conclusion! Farewell, Goku! Until the Day We Meet Again!
episodes.description: The Tournament of Power reaches its final climactic moment, as Goku, Frieza and 17 have to eliminate Jiren for the survival of Universe 7.

episodes.title: A Devastating Wish
episodes.description: After decades of persistence, Emperor Pilaf finally steals the dragon balls and summons Shenron! But Pilaf slips up yet again and wishes Goku back to childhood size!. As Goku tries to present his new self to his family, King Kai reveals alarming news. If the dragon balls aren't returned to Earth within one year, the entire planet will explode!

episodes.title: Pan Blasts Off
episodes.description: While Bulma, Videl, and Gohan prepare a ship that will be used to gather the Black Star Dragon Balls from space, Pan becomes upset at how the others view her as a child. In the meantime, Goku is kidnapped by two men seeking to gain a ransom from a not-so-worried Bulma and Vegeta.

episodes.title: Terror on Imecka
episodes.description: After suffering damage to their spaceship, Goku, Trunks, and Pan are forced to crash land on Planet Imecka. The trio is enamored by the festive atmosphere of the city until they realize that the Imeckians are money-hungry swindlers. At first the travelers from Earth are trying to escape with their wallets, but it soon becomes clear that they'll be lucky to escape with their lives!

episodes.title: The Most Wanted List
episodes.description: After finding themselves as public enemy number one on the merchant planet, Imecka, Goku, Pan, and Trunks attempt a daring rescue mission to salvage their ship. Without it they may be stuck on the planet forever! Casting all fear aside, the Saiyans try a direct approach...and find Don Kee's army locked and loaded!

episodes.title: Goku vs. Ledgic
episodes.description: While hiding from the authorities, Goku, Pan, and Trunks become moved by the injustices that the Imeckans suffer under the oppressive Don Kee. They decide to confront The Don, and head straight for a showdown at the Royal Palace. It seems like an easy victory until Ledgic appears from the shadows!

episodes.title: Like Pulling Teeth
episodes.description: Barely escaping Imecka with their lives, Goku, Trunks, and Pan land on a planet where everything is larger than life. As they near the dragon ball their good fortune takes a turn for the worse as a giant nearly consumes the ball and dooms Earth forever! Goku must make a quick decision before having to charge into the belly of the beast...literally!

episodes.title: Trunks, the Bride
episodes.description: The Saiyans arrive on a peaceful plant with one very large problem. The monster Zoonama has the incredible ability to produce earthquakes by merely shaking his gigantic whiskers! Now the monster is demanding a bride. If the villagers don't comply their very survival cannot be guaranteed!

episodes.title: Whisker Power
episodes.description: Not bowing to the demands of the wicked Zoonama, Trunks reluctantly poses as Zoonama's bride in an attempt to sneak deep into the monster's lair under a volcano and free the people of the village forever. But things get hot as Zoonama reveals a secret and the volcano prepares to blow!

episodes.title: Lord Luud
episodes.description: After seemingly securing a dragon ball, three mysterious strangers steal what the Saiyans worked so hard to attain. In their haste to track down the thieves, Goku, Pan, and Trunks find themselves tricked into touching down on a dangerous asteroid. Meanwhile the three strangers present the spoils to their bizarre leader! Just who is this mystery man...and what makes him so dangerous?

episodes.title: Dance and Attack
episodes.description: Finding themselves on the cave-ridden planet of Beehey, Goku, Trunks and Pan have run straight into a pack of Mouma, a giant buglike species with a taste for humans! Hiding in the shadows are the Para Bara Brothers, planning out the perfect time to attack with their unique style of dancing.

episodes.title: Lord Luud's Curse
episodes.description: Pan and Giru are stuck on the Para Para Brothers spaceship heading straight for Cardinal Mutchy Mutchy and his demented regime. Meanwhile, Goku and Trunks pursue Pan to the planet. Can anything prepare them for the shock that is to come?

episodes.title: The Last Oracle of Luud
episodes.description: While Pan is under the control of the psychotic Master Dolltaki, Goku and Trunks battle with the vengeful Cardinal Mutchy Mutchy, who can manipulate inanimate objects to attack at will! Meanwhile, Dolltaki has big plans for his faithful believers, as the mighty Lord Luud moves one step closer to being resurrected.

episodes.title: The Man Behind the Curtain
episodes.description: Goku and Trunks have defeated Cardinal Mutchy Mutchy, and now stand before the awakening Luud. When Dolltaki refuses to give up Pan to the ever-growing monster, Dr. Myuu feeds both Pan and Dolltaki to Luud! This sacrifice brings the machine-mutant so close to full operating power that Goku and Trunks alone will be no match for it!

episodes.title: The Battle Within
episodes.description: Determined not to just sit around inside the Luud monster, Pan and the Para Para Brothers force Dolltaki to reveal the secret to escaping their mechanical prison. Meanwhile, Goku does his best to fend off the ever growing monster. There just might be a way to free the imprisoned innocents, but is there enough time?

episodes.title: The Beginning of the End
episodes.description: Trunks and Goku consider returning to Earth so that Pan can be placed out of harms way and Goten can continue the journey as originally planned. But Giru discovers a dragon ball and leads the group to a desert planet where they must ward off menacing monsters and scour the vast sand dunes for the hidden dragon ball. Will they succeed, or will they become nothing but scattered feed for giant centipedes?

episodes.title: Giru's Checkered Past
episodes.description: Giru convinces the Z warriors to land on Planet M2, his home planet. It is a trap though and Giru is greeted by General Rildo and is told he has done a good job of luring the humans to the planet. At the end of the episode the Z warriors meet up with a group of strong robots who call themselves M2's commandoes. After a short fight the robots capture Trunks and Goku and take them away.

episodes.title: Pan's Gambit
episodes.description: Just as he is freed from Dr. Myuu's laboratory by Pan, Goku comes face  to face with General Rilldo's top fighting machine the Mega Canon Sigma  Force! With the ability to combine their mechanical bodies into many  different deadly weapons, these Killer-Bots may make this the shortest  rescue attempt ever!

episodes.title: Unexpected Power
episodes.description: With Giru's dark secret out in the open, Goku, Pan, and Trunks are more  determined than ever before to complete their dangerous mission. Having  barely survived the terrible Mega Canon Sigma Force, do the heroes have  enough strength left to fend off the amazing new threat looming on the  horizon?

episodes.title: A General Uprising
episodes.description: Goku and Rilldo continue to fight, but Rilldo reveals his secret power.

episodes.title: The Source of Rilldo's Power
episodes.description: Still trapped on the planet of the Machine Mutants, Goku and Pan succumb  to General Rilldo's tricky tactics and become frozen in metal. The evil  Dr. Myuu has them sent to his laboratory to join Trunks so he can drain  the trio's Saiyan powers and use them at his will! And the  double-crossing Giru shows he has more than one trick up his sleeve!

episodes.title: A Secret Revealed
episodes.description: After removing all control from Dr. Myuu, Trunks reveals the mystery  that drove him to deceive. Behind a door lies the doctor's darkest  secret Baby, a creature designed to subjugate the entire galaxy! Are the  three Saiyans enough to put this child out of commission?

episodes.title: The Baby Secret
episodes.description: After removing all control from Dr. Myuu, Trunks reveals the mystery that drove him to deceive. Behind a door lies the doctor's darkest secret Baby, a creature designed to subjugate the entire galaxy! Are the three Saiyans enough to put this child out of commission?

episodes.title: Hidden Danger
episodes.description: Believing Dr. Myuu's evil vision contained, Goku, Pan, and Trunks set out to recover the remaining Dragonballs. Their search leads them to a battered ship soon to be destroyed by the gravity of a nearby star! But a dragon ball is not the only discovery that the tattered craft offers up; something onboard is alive!

episodes.title: Discovering the Truth
episodes.description: Goku and the others take a short detour from Dragon Ball hunting and land on Planet Vidal to get medical treatment for the boy that they rescued in outer-space. But who is this mysterious, young survivor and why can't the Doctor assigned to his case be trusted?

episodes.title: Baby's Arrival
episodes.description: When a roughneck starts wreaking havoc in the city, Goten has to interrupt his big date to teach him a lesson. But as soon as Goten subdues him, another deranged fighter steps out of the crowd to take his place. Who are these strange criminals and where do they get their super strength?

episodes.title: Saiyan Hunting
episodes.description: As Baby continues to seek out the Saiyans, he makes his way across Earth using the bodies of unsuspecting humans as his vehicle. But he finds resistance in the face of whom he hunts, Goten! Does Goten have what it takes to put this guy to a stop before he finds the other Saiyans?

episodes.title: The Attack on Vegeta
episodes.description: As Goku, Trunks, and Pan stand on the brink of finding the last Dragon Ball, Baby uses Goten as a puppet so he can infiltrate Gohan's body. What is the ultimate plan of this formidable creature? And what kind of earth is waiting for our travelers when they return?

episodes.title: A Worldwide Problem
episodes.description: With Vegeta's awesome power at his disposal, Baby's plan for world subjugation is nearly complete. And with Goku, Trunks, and Pan returning to Earth with the Dragon Balls his sinister nightmare is mere moments away from becoming reality!

episodes.title: The Fall of the Saiyans
episodes.description: After sealing the Dragon Balls away with Dende, Goku believes Earth is spared from terrible destruction. But his darkest fears soon come to life as Baby-Vegeta comes calling! But how can Goku drive Baby from his friends and family without destroying them in the process?

episodes.title: The Game After Life
episodes.description: After taking the full force of Baby-Vegeta's most powerful attack, Goku appears to have died! Baby-Vegeta begins the next phase of his master plan to use the power of the dragon balls to create a new home world for his followers! With Goku out of the picture, is there anyone left who can stop him?

episodes.title: Collapse From Within
episodes.description: Despite being miraculously saved by Kibito at the last moment, Goku finds himself playing a twisted game of chance in a bizarre world where nothing is at it seems. The only way out is for Goku to win the game. But with Vegeta-Baby moving his followers to the new planet, Goku may be too late!

episodes.title: The Return of Uub
episodes.description: After literally saving Pan from the clutches of Baby, Uub tries his best to pick up where Goku left off. But Baby proves to be a formidable adversary. All the while, Goku is with Old Kai, enduring the strangest training technique anyone has ever seen! Will it give Goku the kind of ability it will take to beat Baby?

episodes.title: The Tail's Tale
episodes.description: The fate of Earth dangles by a thin thread, as Uub finds out quickly that he is no match for Baby on his own. Buu steps in to save him, and morphs himself into Uub's body, combining each of their strength's into one brutal force. Meanwhile, the time has come for Goku to attempt to resurrect his long gone powers!

episodes.title: Back in the Game
episodes.description: After completing his tail stretching, Goku heads back to the Tuffle planet to fight alongside Uub. But he's too late. Having to face Baby alone, Goku must use his new-found abilities. But will they be too much even for the mightiest Saiyan to handle?

episodes.title: Goku's Ascension
episodes.description: After Baby flees from defeat by the claws of the ape, Goku finally transforms into a Super Saiyan 4!  With his power increased to its maximum, Goku sets out to find where Baby is hiding and finish him off for good.  But with Bulma's help, Baby might just be able to find the strength inside his Saiyan host to bring himself up to, and even, Goku's power level!

episodes.title: The Tuffle Gorilla Attacks!
episodes.description: As Goku settles into his new Super Saiyan 4 abilities, a device is constructed to grand Baby Vegeta the power to crush Goku for good!  But when the device is used, Baby Vegeta transforms into a monstrous gorilla.  And then even Goku's fiercest attacks won't be enough to stop the blind rage of this beast!

episodes.title: Old Kai's Last Stand
episodes.description: With Goku only moments away form destruction at the hands of Baby, Elder Kai charges Kibito Kai with a top secret mission.  But he will have to hurry!  Bulma showers Baby with Blutz Waves vastly increasing his strength and causing him to go on a rampage that could destroy his own planet!

episodes.title: Family Bonds
episodes.description: Old Kai's quick thinking has freed Trunks, Goten, and Gohan from Baby's control!  But even their combined strengths are not enough to stop Baby.  Only Super Saiyan 4 Goku has the power to stop the madness, but the battle with Baby has left Goku totally spent!  Does Baby have what it takes to finally achieve his evil plans?

episodes.title: Baby Put to Rest
episodes.description: A fully-charged Super Saiyan 4 Goku squares off with Baby in the deciding battle for the fate of the Universe!  Only one of them can leave the Tuffle Planet alive.  But destroying Baby means destroying Vegeta!  With the fate of the universe in his hands, Goku makes a split-second decision that could change his life forever!

episodes.title: Piccolo's Decision
episodes.description: With Baby destroyed forever, Goku learns the Earth is set to explode in a mere two weeks!  Goku organizes a massive relocation to the Tuffle Planet, leaving himself and Piccolo trapped on Earth with no energy to transport them to safety.  With the Earth only moments away from destruction, one of the heroes will be forces to stay behind to share the planet's fate!

episodes.title: Curtain Call
episodes.description: Following the final battle with Baby, all of humanity was returned to Earth with a final wish.  As things return to normal, it's time once again for the World Martial Ares Tournament.  But this contest proves to be a test for all as Goku and Pan fight in the wrong divisions, a plan to fix the figure is unearthed and an old ally returns to battle Goku one last time!

episodes.title: A Dangerous Union
episodes.description: In the depths of Hell, an evil union between Dr. Gero and Dr. Myuu takes place.  Soon after, Trunks is ambushed by Android 17 as a warning to Goku...  Come to Hell or Earth will be attacked!  As Goku travels to Hell to meet an uncertain fate, a fleet of ancient enemies flood the earth on a mad rampage!

episodes.title: The Resurrection of Cell and Frieza
episodes.description: Cell and Frieza are back!  After getting trapped in Hell, Goku must confront and defeat the villains if he is to return to Earth.  But things get sticky when he falls in the deepest, darkest realm of Hell, where he must endure tests that would drive an ordinary person to madness!

episodes.title: 17 Times 2
episodes.description: With Goku fighting for his life in Hell, the heroes of Earth are having troubles of their own... the two No. 17s have merged!  Super 17 is the ultimate artificial killing machine... something that Goku's closest friend tragically learns first-hand!

episodes.title: Piccolo's Best Bet
episodes.description: Super 17's destructive power reaches new heights as the Z-Fighters are left battered and broken at the android's feet.  Vegeta knows he must make a stand or all hope will be lost.  But Piccolo has a plan to free Goku from his other worldly prison.

episodes.title: Raising the Stakes
episodes.description: Goku's attacks are useless against Super 17!  Knowing Goku's abilities first-hand, Dr. Myuu programmed Super 17 to predict Goku's techniques and attacks.... and the ability to transfer the attacks into fuel for the android killer!  As each moment passes, Super 17 gets stronger... and Goku gets closer to his demise!

episodes.title: The Greatest Surprise
episodes.description: While Goku is preparing for the end, help comes from an unlikely source.  It is Android 18, and she is mad!  Determined to avenge the death of her beloved, No. 18 unleashes her full fury upon her android brother.  As everyone watches in disbelief, they are unaware that the most dangerous power of all time is about to be awakened!

episodes.title: The Shadow Dragons
episodes.description: When an evil Dragon emerges from the cracked Dragon Balls, it seems like the world has become cracked as well.  After stealing the Dragon Balls, he spawns seven more evil Dragons that disappear across the horizon like wild jackals in the night!  What horrors are in store for Mother Earth and her people!

episodes.title: The Two-Star Dragon
episodes.description: Haze Shenron, the dragon of pollution, has begun contaminating everything in his path by emanating a toxic mist that poisons everyone and everything who breathes it.  Goku and Pan soon find themselves overcome by the noxious fumes.  With the Saiyans chocking on foul air, help must come from an unexpected source.

episodes.title: The Five-Star Dragon
episodes.description: During Goku and Pan's continuing quest for the Dragon Balls, they stumble upon an abandoned city.  They are warned away byt a couple that blames the mass exodus on an energy-absorbing slime.  After resolving to stay and complete their task, they find Rage Shenron, the 5-star dragon!  And they quickly realize this electric slime has a bigger and much deadlier purpose!

episodes.title: The Six-Star Dragon
episodes.description: What was once a peaceful seaside village becomes a battleground as Goku and Pan square off against Oceanus Shenron, the 6-star dragon.  Goku is soon caught in the fury of the dragon's assault and unable to break the Oceanus Shenron's powerful defense.  The situation becomes direr and with every passing moment... until Pan is forced to take action!

episodes.title: The Seven-Star Dragon
episodes.description: After stumbling upon Naturon Shenron as he burrowed through the ground, Goku and Pan have to save and entire city from the earthquakes caused by this dragon's digging.  But when the dragon takes a fall a little too soon, all may not be what it seems-and Pan may be in for far more than she bargained for.

episodes.title: Saying Goodbye
episodes.description: Naturon Shenron's secret has come out: The dragon can possess any creature and assume its powers and abilities!  When Naturon takes control of Pan, Goku is forced to make a hear wrenching decision!  Defeating the dragon and reclaiming the Dragon Ball could cost his granddaughter her life!

episodes.title: The Four-Star Dragon
episodes.description: With the four Dragon Balls safely in their possession, Goku and Pan set off in search of the fifth.  But standing in their way is the incredible Nuova Shenron, the Dragon of Fire!  With Pan succumbing to Nuova's sweltering power, the battle for the 4-star ball is about to boil over!

episodes.title: The Heart of the Prince
episodes.description: Throughout the years Vegeta, Prince of Saiyans, has been forced to bear the burden of being second best to his greatest adversary, Goku.  Battling both on the side of Earth's greatest hero and against him, Vegeta comes to a shocking conclusion... and make an even more shocking admission!

episodes.title: The Three-Star Dragon
episodes.description: With Goku winning his battle against Nuova Shenron, he spares the dragon's life in exchange for not killing Pan when he had the chance.  But things get complicated when Eis Shenron shows up to reveal a shocking secret no one saw coming.  With the odds stacked against him, Goku fights for his life against the terrible twosome.

episodes.title: The One-Star Dragon
episodes.description: In the wake of intense fighting between Goku and Nuova Shenron, the devious 3-star dragon, Eis steps in and freezes Goku solid.  As the sibling rivalry boils over between Eis and Nuova, Goku fights back when Eis uses Pan as a human shield!  But there's another fighter luring in the shadows, waiting for the right moment to enter the fray...

episodes.title: Shadow Dragons Unite
episodes.description: After a panicked call for help from Pan, the Z-Fighters descend on the battleground in a frenzy, saving Goku at the last minute!  While the brutal Syn Shenron continues his assault, Goku works up a long shot of a plan.  It's going to take everyone's cooperation to pull this one off, and even that might not be enough!

episodes.title: Super Saiyan 4 Vegeta
episodes.description: After ingesting the Dragon Balls, the ultimate evil dragon, Omega Shenron was born.  Wiht Goku blind and battle weary, is there any way he can stand against the might of all seven dragons?!  Or wil lVegeta rise to the occasion with a surprise revelation?

episodes.title: Super Saiyan 4 Fusion
episodes.description: Even when pitted against two Super Saiyan 4s, Omega Shenron is still vastly superior in speed and strength.  But when Goku and Vegeta perform Fusion, the tables are turned.  Gogeta takes total control of the battlefield, but does he have what it takes to finish the job?  This mischievous powerhouse seems more interested in having fun that saving the day!

episodes.title: The Limits of Power
episodes.description: Goku and Vegeta try to reclaim the advantage by performing fusion again, while Omega Shenron tries to reclaim the power they stole from him!  It's a crazy defensive struggle as each side tries to prevent the other from gaining supremacy and sealing a victory once and for all!

episodes.title: Rescue Goku
episodes.description: Now that Goku and Vegeta are unable to fuse, is there anyone who can stop the evil Omega Shenron?  With a new ally appearing from a most unlikely place-Goku's forehead.  Will the combined forces of Goku, Vegeta, and the revived Nuova Shenron be enough to bring down the ultimate Shadow Dragon?

episodes.title: Universal Allies
episodes.description: It's the final battle for Goku as he continues his struggle with Omega Shenron!  This time though, Goku needs more help than his fellow Z-Fighters can offer.  He enlists the help of King Kai, who helps coordinate the largest attack of all time!

episodes.title: Until We Meet Again...
episodes.description: The Eternal Dragon appears in the sky without being summoned and explains why the Dragon Balls cracked under the pressure of the Negative Energy.  The unfortunate truth about what he must do next is revealed, and a glimpse into the future shows the power behind Shenron's final words.
